205b3(mdo sde): kyis mos pa 'am/ / rang sangs rgyas rnams dad par mi nus te/ gang dag sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa de dag ni mos shing yid ches so// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i
205b4(mdo sde): 'od ni gtsang ba dang / mi gtsang ba gnyis ka la 'char mod kyi/ gtsang ba la'ang sdug par mi byed/ mi gtsang ba la'ang zhe sdang bar mi byed de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la ni sus kyang mi smad do//
205b5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi 'od zer yang nyan thos dang so so'i skye bo la 'char mod kyi/ nyan thos rnams la sdug par yang mi byed/ so so'i skye bo rnams la zhe sdang bar yang mi byed de/
205b6(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa' la sus kyang smad pa med// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam shing pa ri ya tra ka ko bi da ra'i lo ma lhags par gyur pa de'i tshe/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ring por mi thogs par
205b7(mdo sde): shing pa ri la tra ka ko bi dar 'di me tog dang 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur ro snyam nas yid dga' bar 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du nam byang chub sems dpa' bdog pa thams
206a1(mdo sde): cad yongs su gtong bar gyur pa de'i tshe/ ring por mi thogs par byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi me tog dang 'bras bu
206a2(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro zhes/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bstod par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ shing gang dag rlung gis btud/ kun tu btud/ rab tu btud pa de
206a3(mdo sde): dag 'gyel bar 'jigs pa med do/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag sems can thams cad la 'dud/ kun tu 'dud/ rab tu 'dud pa de dag nyan thos dang //
206a4(mdo sde): rang sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bar 'jigs pa med do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ chu ni gang du dma' ba der 'bab bo// 'jam dpal de bzhin du nga rgyal med pa'i byang chub
206a5(mdo sde): sems dpa' yang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang na ba der 'gro'o/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam rgya mtsho chen po dang po gnas pa de'i tshe/ sa chen po thams cad kyi nang na dma'
206a6(mdo sde): ba'i sa phyogs der dang por gnas te/ de nas 'bab chu'i rgyun thams cad tshegs chung ngus der mngon par 'bab par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du nga rgyal med pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
206a7(mdo sde): de la tshegs chung ngus sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nor bu rin po che rdo rjes nor bu rin po che thams cad 'bigs mod kyi/ nor bu
206b1(mdo sde): rin po che rdo rje de ni de dag gis mi phigs so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams 'dul mod kyi/ de dag gis 'dul ba der yang mi lhung ngo //
206b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ me tog man+da ra ba rlung gis bskyod na/ dpag tshad brgya kho ra khor yug tu dris khyab bo// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'i ye shes
206b3(mdo sde): kyis bskyod pa'ang / sems can thams cad la byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i dris khyab par byed de/ 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dag me tog man+da ra ba'i dri snom pa de
206b4(mdo sde): dag ni nang thams cad kyis mi 'debs so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang dag byang chub sems dpa' byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i dri snom pa de dag nyon mongs pa'i nad thams
206b5(mdo sde): cad kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na shing u dum wa ra'i me tog mi 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems
206b6(mdo sde): bskyed pa med na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi me tog kyang mi 'byung ngo // 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ nam klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa char pa 'bebs pa de'i tshe/ 'dzam bu'i
206b7(mdo sde): gling thams cad khyab par char 'bebs so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du nam byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i chos kyi char 'bebs pa de'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi
207a1(mdo sde): rgyud la mnyam par 'bebs so/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ mtsho chen po ma dros pa las chu bo'i rgyun pa ni 'bab ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi yongs su 'gengs
207a2(mdo sde): so/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' yang bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi 'bab pas ye shes kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na//
207a3(mdo sde): rgya mtsho chen po med na 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams nor bu rin po che la spyod par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du sangs rgyas 'byung ba med na nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad rnam
207a4(mdo sde): par grol ba'i chos rin po che la spyod par mi 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang cung zad gzugs yin pa de dag thams cad 'byung ba chen po bzhis yongs su bzung ngo // 'jam
207a5(mdo sde): dpal de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang byin gyis brlabs pa bzhis yongs su bzung ngo / / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ g.yang sanyam dA ba na 'dug pa'i
207a6(mdo sde): sman gyi shing ni skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar mi 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal de bzhin du nyan thos 'khor bas 'jigs pa'i g.yang sa nyam nga bar gnas pa rnams ni skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar
207a7(mdo sde): mi 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ grong khyer gyi nang na 'dug pa'i sman gyi shing ni skye bo mang po'i nye bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du byams pa chen po dang
207b1(mdo sde): snying rje chen po'i nang du song ba'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems bskyed pas sems can thams cad kyis nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal 'di lta /
207b2(mdo sde): dper na/ gang dbyar byung ba'i chu mig de dag ni yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang nyan thos rnams kyi chos bstan pa de ni yun ring du gnas par mi 'gyur ro//
207b3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ gang dpyid byung ba'i chu mig de ni yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro// 'jam dpal de bzhin du gang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi chos bstan pa de ni yun
207b4(mdo sde): ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/ / 'jam dpal 'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po gangs kyi ri'i shing bcad de ni slar yang myur du skye'o// 'jam dpal de bzhin du nam de bzhin gshegs
207b5(mdo sde): pas bya ba byas te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyang dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad
207b6(mdo sde): ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' yon tan bsngags pa tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan pa de dag gis yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa 'di lta bu 'di dag de
207b7(mdo sde): bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ngo mtshar te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' de dag yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa de lta bu de dag thos nas dga' bar mi 'gyur/ rgyags
208a1(mdo sde): par mi 'gyur ba de'ang mchog tu ngo mtshar to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad ni rtsa ba dag pa y
208a2(mdo sde): ang dag pa'i yon tan dang bsngags pa brjod pas dga' bar yang mi 'gyur/ rgyags par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams
208a3(mdo sde): rtsa ba gang las dag pa lags/ bka' sprul pa// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bdag med pa'i rtsa ba dang / sems can med pa dang / srog med pa dang / gso ba med
208a4(mdo sde): pa dang / gang zag med pa'i rtsa ba dang / 'jig tshogs la lta ba'i rtsa ba dang / ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa'i rtsa ba dang / nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba'i rtsa ba las dag go// gsol pa/
208a5(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das dag pa zhes bgyi bas ci zhig bstan pa lags/ bka' stsal pa/ ma bzung ma btang ba ste/ de bas na dag pa zhes bya'o// ma skyes/ ma 'gags/ ma brtags
208a6(mdo sde): rnam par ma brtags/ ma phyung / ma bcug/ ma byas/ rnam par ma byas/ mun pa ma yin/ snang ba ma yin/ nyon mongs pa yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ bcings
208a7(mdo sde): pa ma yin/ thar pa ma yin/ 'khor ba ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa ma yin te/ de bas na dag pa zhes bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste 'khor ba'ang ma lags/
208b1(mdo sde): mya ngan 'das pa'ang ma lags na/ de la dag pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/ rab 'byor gang mya ngan las 'das par yang rlom sems med la/ 'khor ba la mngon par chags pa'ang/
208b2(mdo sde): med pa de nyid 'dir dag pa'o// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' dag pa zhes bya ba yang / nam mkha' ni dag pa'ang ma yin/ nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin te/ 'on kyang nam
208b3(mdo sde): mkha' ni dag pa zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor de bzhin du mya ngan las 'das pa dag pa zhes bya ba yang / mya ngan las 'das pa ni dag pa'ang ma yin/ nyon mongs pa'ang ma yin te/ 'on kyang
208b4(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa dag pa zhes bya'o/ / rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ khyod ci dag pa yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das nam nyon mongs pa mchis pa de'i tshe bdag dag pa'o// /
208b5(mdo sde): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod kyi nyon mongs pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin yongs su dag pa ste/
208b6(mdo sde): bdag gi de yongs su rtogs pas de'i slad du yongs su dag go// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings yongs su shes par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis
208b7(mdo sde): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ste chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs pas chos gzhan 'ga' zhig mchis na ni/ des chos kyi dbyings yongs su 'tshal bar 'gyur gyi/ chos kyi dbyings
209a1(mdo sde): nyid kyis ni chos kyi dbyings yongs su mi 'tshal to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ste chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs par gang chos kyi dbyings yod
209a2(mdo sde): su shes pa'i chos de gang yang med na/ chos kyi dbyings de khyod kyis ji ltar yongs su shes/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cang mi smra bar 'dug go/ de nas
209a3(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor cang mi smra bar 'dug pa la 'di skad ces smras so// btsun pa rab 'byor khyod ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das kyis smras pa'i
209a4(mdo sde): lan blan pa las 'dug par gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gi tshe sngon bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ma zhugs pa de'i tshe nga 'dug go// de ci'i phyir
209a5(mdo sde): zhe na/ nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa/ bar chad dang bcas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa med pa/ bar chad med pa'o//
209a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la thog pa 'am/ bar chad pa gang yang dmigs sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ chos kyi dbyings
209a7(mdo sde): la ni thogs pa 'am/ bar chad mi dmigs so// smras pa/ 'on ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'chad pa las bar chad du gyur/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal gang gis chos kyi dbyings
209b1(mdo sde): la yongs su chad pa'i tshul gyis yongs su shes pa de dag ni chad pa yin gyi/ gang yang chos kyi dbyings la chad pa med pa'i tshul gyis yongs su shes pa de dag ni 'chad par bar mi 'chad do//
209b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ btsun pa rab 'byor ci chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad pa gang yang yod dam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ chos kyi dbyings ni kun gyi sgo ste/ chos kyi dbyings la yongs
209b3(mdo sde): su chad pa gang yang med do/ / smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la yongs su chad par ston/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan thos kyi yul tshang mar byas te/ chos kyi
209b4(mdo sde): dbyings yongs su chad par ston te/ / sangs rgyas kyi yul tshad mar byas te/ de ni chos kyi dbyings chad pa med par ston to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci btsun pa rab 'byor chos kyi dbying
209b5(mdo sde): yul las byung ngam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings yul las byung ba ma yin te/ 'jam dpal de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings ni yul med pa yul dang bral ba'o//
209b6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yul tha dad par ston/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan thos rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa dang bcas pa/
209b7(mdo sde): bar chad dang bcas pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spobs pa ni thogs pa med pa/ bar chad pa meng pa'o zhes dang po nyid du ngas ma smras sam/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa
210a1(mdo sde): btsun pa rab 'byor khyod kyis so so yang dag par rig pa ma thob bam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal ngas so so yang dag par rig pa thob bo// 'jam dpal
210a2(mdo sde): gyis smras pa/ 'o na ci'i phyir tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'chad pa bar chad/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan thos rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa ni sems can gyi dbang po mchog dang /
210a3(mdo sde): mchog ma yin par shes pa dang bral ba ste/ de bas na 'chad pa bar chad do// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi so so yang dag par rig pa ni sems can thams cad kyis dbang po mchog dang
210a4(mdo sde): mchog ma yin pa shes pas bskyed pa ste/ de bas na 'chad pa bar mi 'chad do// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ ci ye shes kyi dbyings gang gis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis so so yang
210a5(mdo sde): dag par rig pa'i ye shes bskyed pa'i ye shes kyi dbyings de bar 'chad pa'i mtshan nyid yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ ye shes kyi dbyings ni thogs
210a6(mdo sde): pa med pa'i mtshan nyid/ bar chad med pa'i mtshan nyid/ bar chad med pa'i rang bzhin can/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ste ye shes kyi dbyings thogs pa
210a7(mdo sde): med pa'i mtshan nyid par chad pa med pa'i rang bzhin can yin na/ 'o na ci'i phyir 'chang pa bar chad/ rab 'byor gyos smras pa/ 'jam dpal tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di nyan thos rnams kyi nang
210b1(mdo sde): na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs kyis/ 'di la dris shig dang / 'di nyid khyod la lan ljon par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
210b2(mdo sde): 'byor nyid kyis shod cig/ nga ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas chos bstan pa nyan par 'dod kyi/ 'chad par ni mi 'dod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas 'di sngon
210b3(mdo sde): sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po'i spyan snga nas chos 'chad cing / nyan thos chen po dag kyang cang mi smra bar 'jog pa ngas mthong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor shar phyogs logs su
210b4(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyo zhing brgya stong phrag mang po 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dang pa can zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
210b5(mdo sde): 'od kyi dpal zhes bya ba da ltar bzhugs te/ 'tsho gzhes chos kyang ston to// de na nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shwe rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan
210b6(mdo sde): 'das des gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi dpal de/ nam nang du yang dag par 'jog par 'gyur/
210b7(mdo sde): pa de'i tshe/ nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma de tshangs pa'i 'jig rten man chad du mngon par song zhing / stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sdud cing chos ston
211a1(mdo sde): to/ / nga dang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang 'jig rten gyi khams der phyin te/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag mang po dang / lha'i bu brgya phrag stong
211a2(mdo sde): yang chos nyan par 'dod pa'i phyir/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i phyi bzhin 'brang bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'od gsal ba'i lha'i ris su 'dug ste/
211a3(mdo sde): lung ba bsal ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten khams thams cad sgras go bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa gong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lud pa bsal
211a4(mdo sde): ba'i sgra byung ngo / / de nas nyan thos chen po des lud pa bsal ba'i sgra de thos pa dang / yud pa bsal ba'i sgra de'i shugs ma bzod pas rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung gis bus pa'i bya bzhin du/
211a5(mdo sde): sa la lhung ste/ de skyo zhing ba spu langs par gyur nas ngo mtshar thob ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi dpal de gang
211a6(mdo sde): na bar der song nas phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lud pa bsal ba'i
211a7(mdo sde): sgra gang thos pas bdag lud pa bsal ba'i sgra'i shugs de ma bzod pas/ rnam par 'thor ba'i rlung gis bus pa'i bya bzhin du sa la ltung bar gyur pa'i lud pa bsal ba'i sgra zab mo 'dra
211b1(mdo sde): lta bu 'di sus bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das des bka' stsal pa/ dge slong 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa zhes bya ba phyir mi ldog pa skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' deng
211b2(mdo sde): la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / yongs su legs par zhu bar bya ba'i phyir/ chags pa med pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis rnam par rtse
211b3(mdo sde): zhing 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'ongs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de 'od gsal gyi lha'i ris su 'dug nas lud pa bsal ba'i sgra gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
211b4(mdo sde): khams thams cad sgras ge bar 'gyur ba dang / bdud kyi gnas thams cad spa gong bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lud pa bsal ba'i sgra phyung ngo // des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das skyes bu dam
211b5(mdo sde): pa de lta bu'i dag mthong nas legs par 'gyur gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de bdag cag gis kyang blta'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
211b6(mdo sde): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi dpal gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'ong bar bya ba'i phyir mtshan ma mdzad do// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa byang chub
211b7(mdo sde): sems dpa' de dag dang / lha'i bu de dag dang lhan cig tu bar snang de las babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
212a1(mdo sde): 'od kyi dpal de gang na ba der dong ste lhags pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor nas 'khor dang
212a2(mdo sde): bcas te/ ji ltar rang gi smon lam dang rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus sprul pa'i stan la phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
212a3(mdo sde): pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi dpal gyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal khyod don gyi dbang ci zhig mthong na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dang pa can
212a4(mdo sde): 'dir 'ongs 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / phyag bgyi ba dang / bsnyen bkur bgyi ba dang / yongs su zhu ba dang / yongs su legs par zhu ba'i slang
212a5(mdo sde): du'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba shin tu rnam par dag par 'gyur/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag byas par
212a6(mdo sde): 'gyur/ ji ltar na bsnyen bkur byas par 'gyur/ ji ltar na yongs su zhus par 'gyur/ ji ltar na yongs su legs par zhus par 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
212a7(mdo sde): nam chos mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa de lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// bcom ldan 'das nam lus dang sems kyis 'dud par mi bgyid
212b1(mdo sde): rab tu 'dud par mi bgyid cing / 'gying ba ma mchis/ zhum pa ma mchis par gnas pa/ mi g.yo ba thob pas/ sems dben pa'i ngang tshul du spyod pa/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du
212b2(mdo sde): byed pa de lta bus ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nam bdag tu sgro 'dogs par mi bgyid/ gzhan du sgro 'dogs par mi bgyid/ mnyam pa nyid
212b3(mdo sde): las mnyam par mi bgyid/ / mi mnyam pa nyid la mi mnyam par mi bgyid cing / bgyid pa ma mchis// rnam par bgyid pa ma mchis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
212b4(mdo sde): dang yang spyod pa gcig tu gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / chos kyi sku'i rjes su 'jug pa/ rang gi lus kyang chos kyi rjes su song bar mthong ba/ mthong ba la mthong bar mi mthong
212b5(mdo sde): ba/ log par mi mthong ba/ gang la'ang ring por mi 'gyur ba/ nye bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu ni de bzhin gshegs pa la bsnyen bkur bgyis par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nam
212b6(mdo sde): tshul bzhin ma lags par ni ma lags kyi/ tshul bzhin du zhu ba tshul bzhin ma lags pa/ ci'ang mi mthong ba/ bdag gi tshul bzhin gyis chos thams cad kyi tshul bzhin gyi
212b7(mdo sde): rjes su 'gro ba g.yengs pa'i sems kyis ma lags kyi/ mnyam par bzhag pas zhu ba gang zhu ba dang / gang gi phyir zhub dang / gang la zhu ba de dus gsum du yongs su tshol zhing
213a1(mdo sde): 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas zhu ba de lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu ba zhus par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das nam zhu ba mchis pa la brnogs
213a2(mdo sde): par mi bgyid pa/ ji skad gsungs pa'i rjes su 'thun par bgyid pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa mnyes par bgyid pa/ 'khor thams cad mgu bar bgyid pa/ yongs su zhu ba la mi chags pa
213a3(mdo sde): yongs su zhu ba des kyang sems can tshad med pa rnams byang chub tu go cha bskon cing / go cha de'ang nam byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du mi 'dor ba de lta bu ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa la
213a4(mdo sde): yongs su legs par zhu ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od kyi dpal des/ 'jam dpal
213a5(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ 'jam dpal de bzhin gshegs pa de ltar blta bar bya'o// de ltar phyag bya'o// de ltar bsnyen pa kun bya'o// de ltar yongs su
213a6(mdo sde): zhu bar bya'o/ / de ltar yongs su legs par zhu bar bya'o zhes smras pa de ni/ khyod kyis legs par bshad do legs so legs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
213a7(mdo sde): nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma la 'di skad ces smras so/ / tshe dang ldan pas de bzhin gshegs pa la ji ltar mthong / ji ltar phyag 'tshal/ ji ltar bsnyen bkur byed/ ji ltar yongs
213b1(mdo sde): su zhu/ ji ltar yongs su legs par zhu/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal bstan pa 'di lta bu ni nged lta bu nyan thos gzhan gyi sgra'i rjes su mos pa rnams kyi yul ma yin no// smras pa/ 'o na gang
213b2(mdo sde): mngon par rtogs pas tshe dang ldan pa shes rab sgron ma'i sems rnam par grol/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal bden pa mngon par rtogs pas bdag gi sems rnam par grol lo// smras pa/
213b3(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa bden pa zhes bya bas ci bstan par 'gyur/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal gnyen po med pas phye ba ni bden pa'o// smras pa/ 'o na ji ltar bden pa mngon par rtogs pas cha
213b4(mdo sde): dang ldan pa'i sems rnam par grol/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal kun rdzob nye bar bzung ste de skad ces ston gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// smras pa/ TI kun rdzob don dam par 'du
213b5(mdo sde): 'am/ des smras pa/ de lta mi 'dun don dam pa med par 'gyur ro// smras pa/ 'o na ji ltar kun rdzob nye bar bzung ste ston gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin/ de ste kun rdzob don dam par
213b6(mdo sde): 'dun ni 'di lta ste/ don dam pa'i bden par bden pa gcig pur mi 'gyur ram/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal bshad pa 'dri thos na las dang po pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams skrag
213b7(mdo sde): par 'gyur ro/ / smras pa/ btsun pa nyid kyang skrag na/ las dang pa pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams lta ci smos/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag skrag par bya mi nus so//
214a1(mdo sde): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa ci sdug pa med pa dang skyo ba med pas// nye bar len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol las/ des smras pa/ 'jam dpal nyan
214a2(mdo sde): thos rnams ni skrag pa dang skyo ba med par rnam par mi grol lo/ / smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa de bas na sngon skrag pa nyid la bsams nas btsun pa nyid kyang skrag na/ las dang po pa'i byang chub
214a3(mdo sde): sems dpa' rnams lta ci smos zhes skad smras so/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par grol/ smras pa/ btsun pa byang chub sems dpa' ni skrag pa
214a4(mdo sde): med pa dang / skye ba med pas rnam par grol lo// smras pa/ 'jam dpal ci la bsams te de skad ston/ smras pa/ bdud kyi sde bye ba phrag brgyas mi skrag cing / sems can rnams
214a5(mdo sde): la chos bshad pas mi skyo la/ bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pa/ mi skrag cing ye shes kyi tshogs tshad med pa bsags pas mi skye'o// de nas 'khor der lha'i bu gang
214a6(mdo sde): dag 'dus par gyur pa de dag gis/ me tog sna tshogs pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la gtor te/ gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snang ba de na de bzhin gshegs pa
214a7(mdo sde): mngon sum du mthong ba yin no/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang du gnas pa'i sa phyogs de'ang mchod rten du 'gyur ro// gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i chos
214b1(mdo sde): bstan pa kun tu shes sam/ kun tu shes par 'gyur ba'i sems can de dag gis kyang bsod nams thams cad yongs su bzung ba yin no zhes de skad kyi tshig smras so// de nas yang 'jam
214b2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa nyan thos rnams kyi nang na shes rab che ba'i mchog tu bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
214b3(mdo sde): na/ ci shes rab de 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid dam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas kyi mtshan nyid/ de ste 'dus byas kyi mtshan nyid yin na ni/ skye zhing 'jig pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de ste 'dus
214b4(mdo sde): ma byas pa'i mtshan nyid yin na ni mtshan nyid gsum las bzlog par 'gyur ro/ / smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'phags pa rnams ni 'dus ma byas kyis phye bar ston to// smras pa/ tshe dang
214b5(mdo sde): ldan pa 'dus ma byas pa gdags par nus sam/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ 'dus ma byas la gdags pa gang yang med do// smras pa/ 'o na ji ltar 'phags pa rnams
214b6(mdo sde): 'dus ma byas kyi phye ba ston/ de skad ces smras pa dang / nyan thos chen po shes rab sgron ma de cang mi smra bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
214b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas 'od kyi dpal des/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal chos gang thos pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// bla na
215a1(mdo sde): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i chos kyi sgo 'ga' zhig rtsoms te 'khor 'dir khyod kyis ston cig/ 'jam dpal gyis gsol
215a2(mdo sde): pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams kyi bstan pa thams cad kyang dben pa'i sgo ste dben pa nyid 'chad do// yang de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi blo gros zhes bya ba 'khor der
215a3(mdo sde): 'dus par gyur te 'dug pa des/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal gang de bzhin gshegs pas 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bstan pa
215a4(mdo sde): de dag ci dben pa'i sgo ste dben pa nyid 'chad pa yin nam/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam
215a5(mdo sde): dpal 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ni rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa las byung ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa'ang gang nas byung /
215a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa ni phyin ci log las byung ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu phyin ci log kyang gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal phyin ci log ni nga dang nga
215a7(mdo sde): zhes bya ba las byung ngo / / smras pa/ rigs kyi bu nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba'ang gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba ni 'jig tshogs la lta ba las byung ngo // smras pa/
215b1(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu 'jig tshogs la lta ba'ang gang nas byung / smras pa/ 'jam dpal 'jig tshogs la lta ba ni bdag las byung ngo // smras pa/ rigs kyi bu bdag kyang gang nas byung / smras pa/
215b2(mdo sde): 'jam dpal bdag ni gang nas kyang ma byung ste/ byung ba med pa ni bdag byung ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar bdag ni phyogs bcur yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs so// smras pa/
215b3(mdo sde): rigs kyi bu chos gang dag phyogs bcur yongs su btsal kyang mi dmigs pa de'i sgo ci zhig yod/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal dbyen pa nyid de'i sgo'o// smras pa/ rig kyi bu dben pa'i sgo ci
215b4(mdo sde): yin/ smras pa/ 'jam dpal sgo med pa nyid dbyen pa'i sgo'o// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu khro bos de las bsams te chos thams cad kyi sgo rnams kyi bstan pa thams cad kyang dben pa'i sgo
215b5(mdo sde): ste/ de dben pa nyid 'chad do zhes de skad smras so// bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' brgyad brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur pa'o// de nas 'jam
215b6(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ der rgya cher chos bstan pa byas nas stan las langs te song ngo // tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas gang gis kyang //
215b7(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des spobs pa'i rgyun gcod nus pa med na/ skabs ma phye bar bdag cag lta bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu smra bar ga la nus/ de nas tshe
216a1(mdo sde): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bul 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa
216a2(mdo sde): spyod pa na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs dang cho 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyed cig mthong / shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kho bos mngon par shes te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
216a3(mdo sde): gyur pa dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod pa na/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang tshig pa de dag ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa song ba dang / chus yongs su gang zhing pad+mo mang pos yog
216a4(mdo sde): par gnas par gyur to/ / gang dag chus yongs su gang ba de dag ni mes yongs su gang bar gnas par gyur te/ me de'ang reg na 'di lta ste dper na/ tsan dan sbrul gyi snying po 'am/ gos
216a5(mdo sde): ka tsa lin de lta bur gyur to/ / gang dag stong pa nam mkhar gyur pa de dag ni tshangs pa'i gzhal med khang gis brgyan cing / bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas yongs
216a6(mdo sde): su gang gnas par gyur to/ / gang dag 'chags pa de dag ni 'jig par snang ngo // gang dag ngan song gis yongs su gang ba de dag ni ngan song thams cad dang bral bar snang ste/ sems
216a7(mdo sde): can de dag kyang byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa thob par gyur to/ / byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa gang zhe na/ gang la snyoms par zhugs
216b1(mdo sde): na bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ sems can gang dag nyon mongs pa 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gis gzir ba
216b2(mdo sde): de dag gi 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug shin tu spang bar bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam sems pa ste/ gang de ltar byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni/
216b3(mdo sde): byang chub kyi yan lag gi rnam pas bskyed pa'i byams pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i tshe de'i dus na/ kho bo'i sems la sems kyi rnam par rtog pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
216b4(mdo sde): sa gyu s
216b5(mdo sde): hes nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir me 'bar ba na/ 'jig rten gyi bar du 'dug ste/ kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu'i
216b6(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya 'am/ 'on te kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgal bar bya/ kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu'i
216b7(mdo sde): mgyogs pas 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya'o zhes/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu'i mgyogs pa'i cho 'phrul thams cad bstan te/ 'dom gang
217a1(mdo sde): tsam khor yug tu me de zhi bar byas nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu nyin zhag bdun gyi khams 'di rgal to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na de bas kyang
217a2(mdo sde): shin tu rgya che zhing yangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su me 'bar ba na/ 'jig rten gyi bar du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug ste/ kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro// btsun pa shA ri'i bu gang
217a3(mdo sde): gi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal bar bya/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus 'jig rten gyi khams 'di las brgal
217a4(mdo sde): bar bya'o/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ mngon par 'du byed pa med pa'i mngon sum gyi rdzu 'phrul sems bskyed pa gcig gis/ 'jig rten gyi khams de me tog pad+mos
217a5(mdo sde): g.yogs te brgal bar gyur to/ / brgal nas kyang kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro// btsun pa shA ri'i bu bdag cag gnyis las su'i mthu dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs mgyogs/ kho bos
217a6(mdo sde): de la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal de ji snyam du sems/ byA lang gu li dang bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gnyis kyi mthu gang gi shin tu mgyogs/ smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu bya'i
217a7(mdo sde): rgyal po nam mkha'i lding gi mthu'i mgyogs pa ni tshad med pa ste/ dpe blang du sla ba ma yin no// de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal bya lang gu li'i mgyogs pa lta bur ni khe bos
217b1(mdo sde): rdzu 'phrul gyi mgyogs pa la blta bar bya'o/ / ji sgyur bya'i rgyal po nam mkha' lding gi mthu'i mgyogs pa de bas kyang brgya myong gos shin tu sgrub par khyod kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu ma phyogs par blta'o//
217b2(mdo sde): des smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu khyod kyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phral gang yin pa dang / bdag gi gang yin pa de gnyis ni mnyam mo snyam du ma gyur
217b3(mdo sde): tam/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji skad smras pa bzhin te/ kho bos snyam du gyur to// des smras pa/ ci'i phyir de snyam du gyur/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// /
217b4(mdo sde): nyan thos rnams ni bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba ma bcad pa'i phyir/ mi mnyam du zin kyang mnyam pa nyid du bdag nyid kyis shes so// des smras pa/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu legs so lags
217b5(mdo sde): so/ / ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa shA ri'i bu sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/ rgya mtsho chen po'i 'gram na/ drang srong chos 'dod ces bya ba dang /
217b6(mdo sde): kun byin zhes bya ba gnyis shig 'khod de/ de la chos 'dod ni lnga mngon par shes shing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse bar gyur to// kun byin ni rig pa dang sngags kyi mthus kun steng gi bar snang
217b7(mdo sde): la 'gro bar gyur to/ / de nas de gnyis dus dus su spyod pa'i phyir rgya mtsho'i tshu rol nas pha rol du 'dong ngo // dong nas slar log cing rang rang gi gnas su 'khod do// de nas drang srong kun
218a1(mdo sde): byin de kho bo'i rdzu 'phrul gang yin pa dang / chos 'dod kyi gang yin pa de gnyis ni mnyam mo snyam du gyur to// de nas dus gzhan zhig na rgya mtsho'i tshu rol nas pha rol du dong
218a2(mdo sde): ste/ srin mo'i gling du phyin pa dang / der srin mo de dag gis yid du 'ong ba'i rol mo'i sgra byas par gyur pa'ang drang srong kun byin gyis thos/ srin mo de dag mthong nas nam mkha'i dkyil nas sa'i steng
218a3(mdo sde): du lhung ngo / / de'i rig pa dang sngags kyang ma rung bar gyur to// de nas drang srong chos 'dod snying rje'i sems skyes nas/ lag pa g.yas pas bzung ste slar yang rang gi gnas su khrid nas bzhag go// /
218a4(mdo sde): btsun pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chos 'dod ces bya ba gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod the tsom mam yid gnyis su gyur na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kho bo nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong chos
218a5(mdo sde): 'dod ces bya bar gyur to/ / btsun pa shA ri'i bu de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong kun byin bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa snyam du khyod the tsom mam yid gaN+DI sa gyur na de ltar mi blta'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ khyod nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na drang srong kun byin zhes bya bar
218a6(mdo sde): gyur te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de'i tshe yang mi mnyam pa bdag dang mnyam pa nyid du bzhag go/ de ltar dade phyogs gcig pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'i phyir da ltar yang mi mnyam bzhin du bdag
218a7(mdo sde): dang mnyam par gzhag go/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la yang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ngas mngon par shes te/ 'jam dpal gzhon
218b1(mdo sde): nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu lho phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing du spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi dang mang po brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgyan thams cad kyis sung
218b2(mdo sde): pa zhes bya ba na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing zhes bya ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du bcom ldan 'das de blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i phyir
218b3(mdo sde): phyin te/ de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas kho bo la 'di skad ces zer ro// btsun pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu khyod kyis gang bdag gis brgal ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mthong ngam/
218b4(mdo sde): kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal mthong ngo // des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ci 'dra bar mthong / de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras
218b5(mdo sde): so/ / kha cig ni mes yongs su gang ba'o// kha cig ni chus yongs su gang ba'o// kha cog ni nam mkhar gyur pa'o// kha cig ni rab tu 'byor cing rgyas pa'o// kha cig ni 'jig pa'o//
218b6(mdo sde): kha cig ni 'chags pa'o// kha cig ni ngan song gis yongs su gang ba'o// kha cig ni ngan song dang yongs su bral ba'o// smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
218b7(mdo sde): dag ji ltar blta bar bya/ / de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// gang dag mes yongs su gang ba de dag ni mes yongs su gang ba nyid du blta bar bya'o// gang dag chus yongs su gang ba de dag ni
219a1(mdo sde): chus yongs su gang ba nyid du blta bar bya'o/ / gang dag nam mkhar gyur pa de dag ni nam mkhar gyur pa nyid du blta bar bya'o// gang dag 'byor cing rgyas pa de dag ni 'byor
219a2(mdo sde): cing rgyas pa nyid du blta bar bya'o/ / gang dag 'dzag pa de dag ni 'jig pa nyid du blta bar bya'o// gang dag 'chags pa de dag ni 'chags pa nyid du blta bar bya'o// gang dag ngan song dang bral ba
219a3(mdo sde): dedag ni ngan song dang bral ba nyid du blta bar bya'o/ / des smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu ye shes kyi yul ji lta ba bshad pa'ang de bzhin no// de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so//
219a4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag ji ltar mthong / des spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni nam mkha' zhing du mthong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
219a5(mdo sde): 'di lta ste/ mes yongs su gang ba'am/ chus yongs su gang ba 'am/ 'byor cing rgyas pa 'am/ 'jig pa 'am/ 'chags pa 'am/ ngan song gis yongs su gang ba 'am/ ngan song
219a6(mdo sde): dang bral ba de dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'o/ / rkyen de dag ni glo bur du byung ba ste/ skye zhing 'jig pa dang ldan pa'o// nam mkha' ni rkyen gyis byung ba ma yin te/ rang bzhin du gnas pa
219a7(mdo sde): nyid do/ / de bzhin du glo bur gyi nye ba'i nyon mongs pas sems nyon mongs pa zhes bya ste/ sems kyi rang bzhin ni nam yang nyon mongs par gyur pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu
219b1(mdo sde): 'di lta ste dper na/ 'das pa'i dus na/ gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bskal pas bsregs byung yang nam mkha' la sngon nam yang tshig pa med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu de bzhin du
219b2(mdo sde): sems can re res kyang gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi mi dge ba'i las mngon par 'du byas kyang sems kyi rang bzhin ni nam yang de bzhin du nyon mongs par gyur pa med do/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i
219b3(mdo sde): bu rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo gang la la rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag pa'i chos kyi dbyings de lta bu la 'jug pa de dag ni/ kun nas ldang ba'am/ sgrib pa 'am/ mngon par 'du byed
219b4(mdo sde): pas kun nas ldang bar 'gyur ba cung zad kyang med de/ 'di ni kun nas ldang ba med pa'i chos kyi sgo'o// chos kyi sgo de la brtan na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams chos
219b5(mdo sde): thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs su dag par zhugs nas nyes pa las 'byung ba la mkhas par shes shing de'i sems nams kyang sgrib pas sgrib par mi 'gyur ro/ / tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jam dpal
219b6(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa rdzu 'phrul rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos bstan pa rnam par 'phrul pa las gang kho bos phyogs tsam zhig mngon sum du gyur pa ni de lta bu de dag yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan
219b7(mdo sde): ba kun dga' bos/ / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bul 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kha cig mngon sum du gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos
220a1(mdo sde): mngon par shes te/ dus gcig cig na bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 'di nyid na dge slong brgyad brgya'i dge
220a2(mdo sde): slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de'i tshe na mnyan du yod par dus ma yin pa'i sprin chen po zhig byung ste/ de las nyin zhag
220a3(mdo sde): bdun du rgyun ma chad par dus ma yin pa'i char chen po bab bo/ / de na dge slong gang dag rdzu 'phrul che ba/ mthu che ba/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyom
220a4(mdo sde): par 'jug pa thob pa de dag ni bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pas dus 'da' bar byas kyi/ gang dag ma thob pa de dag ni nyin zhag bdun
220a5(mdo sde): du zas chad par gyur to/ / de nas dge slong de dag nyam chung ba dang ldan te/ bcom ldan 'das la blta ba'i phyir 'dong yang ma nus nas/ de la kho bos 'di snyam du gyur te/ e ma'o dge slong 'di
220a6(mdo sde): dag ni rjud par gyur na/ bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ste/ tshul de dag bcom ldan 'das la gsol lo snyam du gyur nas/ kho bo bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang /
220a7(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das e ma'o dge slong 'di dag nyin zhag bdun du 'tshal
220b1(mdo sde): ma chad de/ bkres pas nyam chung ba dang ldan nas rjud de khri dang khri'u las ldang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das blta ba'i slad du mchi ba'i rdo yang mi thog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis
220b2(mdo sde): kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo song ste 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshul de dag sbom shig dang / de dge slong gi dge 'dun rtas par byed par 'gyur ro// 9
220b3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar mnyan nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bdag gi gtsug lag khang na brgya
220b4(mdo sde): byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba rnams la chos ston pa mthong ngo // 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa des kyang kho bo gtsug lag khang gi nang du 'ongs pa mthong ste/ mthong nas
220b5(mdo sde): 'di skad ces zer ro/ / btsun pa kun dga' bo khyod ci'i phyir rlung dang char gyi nang na 'dir 'ongs/ kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la tshul de dag smras so// des kho bo la kun
220b6(mdo sde): dga' bo song ste stan thing la/ gdugs tshod bab na 'gan de rdungs shig ces de skad zer nas/ kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gtsug lag khang nas byung ste/ dge 'dun gyi kun
220b7(mdo sde): dga' ra bar song nas stan bting ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ci gtsug lag khang nas byung ngam zhes/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i gtsug lag khang du lta zhing phyogs
221a1(mdo sde): gcig tu 'dug go/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas lus thams cad rnam par sgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ sprul pa
221a2(mdo sde): gzhan zhig sprul te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba de dag la chos ston to// de gtsug lag khang de nas byung ste/ mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms
221a3(mdo sde): kyi phyir zhugs nas/ kho bos ni ma mthong ngo // de nas bdud sdig can 'di snyam du gyur te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dis seng ge'i sgra bsgrags nas/ mnyan du yod pa'i grong
221a4(mdo sde): khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir zhugs na/ bdag gis 'di mi mthong bar bya'o snyam du gyur nas/ des de nyid kyi tshe mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po'i bram ze dang / khyim bdag dang /
221a5(mdo sde): grong 'dab pa dang / gzhongs pa gang gis kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa mi mthong ba dang / gang yang bsur mi 'ong ba dang / su'ang bsod snyoms mi 'bul ba de lta de ltar byin gyis
221a6(mdo sde): brlabs so/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang dang gang du song ba de dag thams cad ni sgo dag kyang bcad par snang ste/ gang yang mi bsu bar gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal
221a7(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pas bsams na/ e ma'o bram ze dang khyim bdag 'di dag ni ci nas kyang bdag mi mthong ba dang / gtam mi bya bar bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs so snyam du gyur nas
221b1(mdo sde): des de'i tshe gang bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig dang / bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs gang dag gis bdag gi ba spu'i khung bu gcig lus la skyes pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po de yang / gang+gA'i
221b2(mdo sde): klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdud sdig can rnams la med pa'i bden pa'i tshig des/ bdud kyi byin gyi rlabs 'di dag med par gyur cig/ bdud sdig can nyid kyang khyim bdag
221b3(mdo sde): gi tshul du srang dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms phul cig phul cig/ 'di la phul na 'bras bu che bar 'gyur ro// gang gis stong
221b4(mdo sde): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad lo 'bum du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas/ gus par byas/ phu dud du byas pa bas/
221b5(mdo sde): gang gis 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms sen mo'i rtse mo gang tsam phul na/ de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du bskyed par 'gyur zhes sgrogs par gyur cig ces bden
221b6(mdo sde): pa'i byin gyi rlabs byas so/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs de byas ma thag tu/ de nas de nyid kyi tshe sgo thams cad kyang bye bar gyur to// skye bo mang po thams cad kyang
221b7(mdo sde): bsu zhing / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bde bar 'ongs sam zhes kyang brjod do// bdud sdig can nyid kyang khyim bdag gi tshul du srang dang / sum mdo dang / bzhi mdo dag na/
222a1(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms phul cig phul cig/ 'di la phul na 'bras bu che bar 'gyur ro// gang gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
222a2(mdo sde): gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad la lo 'bum du bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas/ gus par byas/ phud dud du byas pa bas/ gang gis 'jam dpal
222a3(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la bsod snyoms sen mo gang tsam phul na/ de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang du skyed par 'gyur ro zhes sgrogs par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
222a4(mdo sde): ci nas kyang lhung bzed der bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba phal cher bcug pa de dag thams cad ji ltar snod so sor bcug pa bzhin du ma 'dres par 'dug pa dang
222a5(mdo sde): gang dge slong brgyad brgya po de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong po de la kha zas ji tsam gyis chog pa des lhung bzed des blangs par gyur pa de lta de ltar rang gi lhung bzed de byin
222a6(mdo sde): gyis brlabs so/ / de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen por bsod snyoms kyi phyir spyad nas/ mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer gyi phyi rol du byung ste lam
222a7(mdo sde): las byol nas/ lhung bzed de sa'i steng du bzhag ste/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad smras so// sdig can lhung bzed 'di khyer la mdun du song zhig/ de nas bdud sdig can gyis lhung
222b1(mdo sde): bzed de sa de las gdeg par byas na gdeg ma nus nas/ des 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal lhung bzed 'di sa'i steng nas gdeg par ma nus
222b2(mdo sde): so/ smras pa/ sdig can khyod kyang rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu chen po dang ldan pa yin na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis lhung bzed 'di sa'i steng nas gdeg par gyis shig/ de nas bdud sdig
222b3(mdo sde): can gyi rdzu 'phrul gyi stobs kyis cho 'phrul thams cad bstan kyang lhung bzed de sa de las chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha tsam yang gdeg par ma nus nas de ngo mtshar thob ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur
222b4(mdo sde): pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal kho bo ni 'dod na ri gshol mdara' 'dzin yang lag mthil du blangs te nam mkha' la 'dor na/ kho bos lhung bzed chung ngu 'di lta bu 'di sa'i steng nas
222b5(mdo sde): gdeg par ma nus na/ de ci'i phyir de ltar 'gyur/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sems can chen po rnams dang gang zag chen po rnams kyi stobs drangs pa lhung bzed 'dir bcug ste//
222b6(mdo sde): de'i phyir khyod kyis gdeg par ma nus so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa nyid kyis lhung bzed de sa las blangs nas bdud sdig can la byin te 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can
222b7(mdo sde): lhung bzed 'di khyer la mdun du song zhig/ de nas bdud sdig can de slob ma bzhin du lhung bzed khyer te 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i mdun du song ngo // de nas lha'i bu dbang sgyur
223a1(mdo sde): lha'i bu khri nyis stong gis bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na bar dong nas lhags pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa
223a2(mdo sde): gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so// sdig can bran bzhin du 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lhung bzed khyer te mdun du 'gro ba 'di ci zhig
223a3(mdo sde): bdud kyis smras pa/ lha'i bu mthu dang ldan pa rnams dang 'gran pa ci'ang med do// lha'i bus smras pa/ sdig can khyod kyang rdzu 'phrul che ba mthu chen po dang ldan pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal
223a4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa'i byon rlabs kyi/ bdud sdig can gyis/ lha'i bu dbang sgyur la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i bu 'di lta ste/ bdud kyi stobs ni gti mug gi stobs so// byang chub
223a5(mdo sde): sems dpa'i stobs ni shes rab kyi stobs so/ / bdud kyi stobs ni nga rgyal gyi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni ye shes kyi stobs so// bdud kyi stobs ni lta ba 'byung
223a6(mdo sde): ba'i stobs so/ / byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni stong pa nyid kyi stobs so// bdud kyi stobs ni phyin ci log gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni bden pa'i stobs so//
223a7(mdo sde): bdud kyi stobs ning dang nga'i zhes bya ba'i stobs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po'i stobs so// bdud kyi stobs ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang /
223b1(mdo sde): gti mug gi stobs so// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi stobs so// bdud kyi stobs ni skye ba dang / 'chi ba dang / 'byung ba'i stobs so// byang chub
223b2(mdo sde): sems dpa'i stobs ni skye ba med pa dang / 'byung ba med pa'i chos la bzod pa rab tu thob po'i stobs so// bdud sdig can gyis bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ lha'i bu'i 'khor de las
223b3(mdo sde): lha'i bu lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/ / byang chub sems dpa' nyis brgyas mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal
223b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa bdud sdig can dang lhan cig tu lhung bzed de khyams zlum por bzhag ste/ song yang kho bos ma mthong nas/ gdugs tshod la bab par gyur kyang / 'jam dpal gzhon
223b5(mdo sde): nur gyur pa gtsug lag khang de nas byung ba'am zhugs par yang mi mthong ste/ de la kho bo 'di snyam du gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dge slong gi dge 'dun ma bslus sam/
223b6(mdo sde): bdag bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du song ste tshul de dag gsol lo snyam du gyur nas/ kho bo bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das
223b7(mdo sde): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das gdugs tshod la bab na/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ni gtsug lag khang de nas ma byung ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kho bo la 'di skad ces
224a1(mdo sde): bka' stsal to/ / kun dga' bo khyod kyis khams zlum po der cir yang ma mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das la/ kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
224a2(mdo sde): ldan 'das de na lhung bzed zas kyis gang ba gcig cig gda' 'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo song la 'gan de brdungs te dge slong
224a3(mdo sde): gi dge 'dun sdus shig/ bcom ldan 'das la/ kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das dge slong gi dge 'dun 'di dag mang po zhig mchis na/ lhung bzed gcig
224a4(mdo sde): gang ba'i zas kyis ji ltar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo khyod brtson pa chung bar byos shig/ kun dga' bo gal te stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig
224a5(mdo sde): rten gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyis/ lo 'bum du lhung bzed gcig po de las zos kyang / lhung bzed de ni yongs su zad par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na
224a6(mdo sde): lhung bzed de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byin gyi rlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni zad mi shes pa'i bsod nams
224a7(mdo sde): las byung ba'o/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar kho bos mnyan nas sems dga' bas 'gan de brdungs te dge slong gi dge 'dun yang bsogs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur
224b1(mdo sde): gyur pas 'gan de'i sgra thos nas/ lha'i bu de dag dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang 'grogs te/ rang gi gtsug lag khang nas byung ste khyams zlum por song nas/ lhung bzed de las
224b2(mdo sde): bsod pa'i bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / myang ba rnams ji ltar snod so so na bzhag bzhag pa lta bur phan tshun 'dres pa phal cher byung ste/ dge slong mang po thams cad kyang rtas par
224b3(mdo sde): byas so/ / byang chub sems dpa' mang po thams cad kyang tshim par byas kyang / zas de ni yongs su zad pa 'am gtugs par ma gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis 'jam dpal
224b4(mdo sde): gzhon nur gyur pa la bar chad bya ba'i phyir/ sham thabs legs par ma bgos pa// bla gos legs par ma gyon pa/ sha tshugs ma legs pa/ lhung bzed rdol cing chag pa/
224b5(mdo sde): gos ngan pa sna leb leb po dang / zhar ba dang / 'theng po dang / zha bo dang / de las kha cig ni ha cang ring ba dang / kha cig ni ha cang thung ba/ kha cig ni ha cang gnag pa/ kha cig
224b6(mdo sde): ni ha cang dkar ba/ kha cig ni he cang skem pa/ kha cig ni ha cang sbom pa/ kha cig ni sgur po/ kha cig ni mi'u thung ste/ de dag gzhon pa'i mtha' nas phyag 'tshal zhing rgan pa'i
224b7(mdo sde): mthar 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs gang gis mthong ba'i sems skyo bar 'gyur ba'i dge slong bzhi khri sprul par gyur te/ de dag la'ang lhung bzed de nas bsod pa'i bza' ba dang /
225a1(mdo sde): bca' ba dang / myang ba phal cher phyung ste/ byin kyang lhung bzed de zad par ma gyur to// de nas bdud sdig can gyis sprul pa'i dge slong de dag re res kyang 'bras chan
225a2(mdo sde): yul bying 'dzin gyi bre bo bcu bcu zos kyang tshim par ma gyur pa de ltar byin gyis brlabs so/ / de na rung byed rnams thams cad yongs su skyo bar gyur kyang de dag tshim par byed ma nus so//
225a3(mdo sde): de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gang dge slong de dag lhung bzed rnams kyang yongs su gang la/ lag pa na'ang khams thegs shing khar bcug pa'i kham yang ming mi nus la/
225a4(mdo sde): de dag mgrin pa btsir ba bzhin du mig log ste/ sa la lhung ba de ltar byin gyis brlabs so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ bdud sdig can la 'di skad ces smras so//
225a5(mdo sde): sdig can khyod kyi dge slong 'di dag ci'i phyir zas mi za/ bdud kyis smras pa/ 'jam dpal bdag gi dge slong 'di dag ni shi la thug par gyur na/ khyod kyis dug dang bsres pa'i zas
225a6(mdo sde): ma byin grang / 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ sdig can drug med pa rnams dug sbyin par gal byed/ gang dag drug bsrel ba de dag ni dug sbyin par byed kyi/ gang dag drug mi bsrel ba
225a7(mdo sde): de dag ni dug sbyin par mi byed do/ / sdig can drug ces bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug ste/ de dag kyang legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba
225b1(mdo sde): la med do/ / dug ces bya ba ni ma rig pa dang / srid pa'i sred pa dang / nga dang nga'i zhes bya ba dang / rgyu dang / lta ba dang / ming dang gzugs dang / sdug pa dang / khong khro ba dang //
225b2(mdo sde): bdag tu lta ba dang / gzhan du lta ba dang / sgrib pa dang / kun nas ldang ba dang / phung po la mngon par chags pa dang / khams la rlom sems su byed pa dang / skye mched la yongs su
225b3(mdo sde): 'dzin pa dang / yul la chags pa dang / khams gsum la zhen pa dang / bsdus shing g.yengs pa dang / gzhug cing dbyung ba dang / shi 'pho dang / skye ba dang / 'ong zhing 'gro ba dang /
225b4(mdo sde): lus la mngon par chags pa dang / srog la zhen pa dang / sdug pa yid la byed pa dang / phyin ci log tu gnas pa dang / rten ci 'brel par 'byung ba dang mi mthun pa dang / chad par
225b5(mdo sde): lta ba dang / ther zug tu lta ba dang / srid par lta ba dang / 'jig par lta ba dang / g.yo ba dang / rlom sems dang / rtog pa dang / rnam par rtog pa dang / sogs pa dang /
225b6(mdo sde): mdud pa dang / kun gzhi dang / nges pa'i gzhi dang / zhen pa dang / khyim gyi gnas la dga' ba dang / len pa dang / 'dor ba dang / stong pa nyid kyis skrag pa dang // mtshan
225b7(mdo sde): ma med pa la g.yang sar 'du shes pa dang / smon pa med pa la gshed mar 'du shes pa dang / dmigs su med pa dngos por 'du shes pa dang / nges par 'byung ba'i khams la kha na ma
226a1(mdo sde): tho bar lta ba dang / chu bo las brgal bar 'du shes pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos la chos ma yin par 'du shes pa dang / yang dag par lta ba la log par lta bar
226a2(mdo sde): 'du shes pa dang / log par lta ba la yang dag par lta bar 'du shes pa dang / dge ba'i bshes gnyen la sdig pa'i grogs por 'du shes pa dang / sdig pa'i grogs po la dge ba'i bshes
226a3(mdo sde): gnyen du 'du shes pa dang / sangs rgyas dang mi mthun pa dang / chos spong ba dang / dge 'dun la ma gus pa dang / dgon pa'i gnas la mngon par mi dga' ba dang / nga rgyal dang
226a4(mdo sde): lhag pa'i nga rgyal dang / nga zhes bya ba'i nga rgyal ma spangs pa dang / gdon dang rtsod pa 'bar bar byed pa dang / bden pa la brdzun par 'du shes pa dang / brdzun pa la bden par 'du
226a5(mdo sde): shes pa dang / 'dod pa la yon tan du 'du shes pa dang / 'dus byas pa la badre bar 'du shes pa dang / 'khor ba la bsngags pa rnam pa bcur 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan las 'das
226a6(mdo sde): pa la 'jigs pa rnam pa bcur 'du shes pa'i chos de lta bu de dag ni dug yin te/ sdig can de dag ni legs par gsungs pa'i chos 'dul ba la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
226a7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdud rtsi bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bde ba bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni spros pa med pa'i bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni
226b1(mdo sde): ma smad pa'i bstan pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni kun nas ldang ba med pa'i bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni 'byung ba bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni 'thab pa med pa
226b2(mdo sde): bstan pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni rtsod pa med pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdag dang gzhan mi gdung ba bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni byams pa dang ldan
226b3(mdo sde): pa bstan pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni gnas dang / skyabs dang / gling dang / rten gyi bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni dul ba dang / zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang
226b4(mdo sde): nye bar zhi ba bstan pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni dag pa dang / rnam par dag pa dang / yongs su dag pa dang / 'od gsal ba bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni yang
226b5(mdo sde): dag pa'i nan tan bstan pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni mi skyo ba bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni shin tu dul ba bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni shin tu rnam par
226b6(mdo sde): dag pa bstan pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bstod cing bsngags pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni zhi ba dang / rab tu zhi ba dang / shin tu bsams pa bstan pa'o//
226b7(mdo sde): sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba dang / yongs su grol ba bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni pha rol gyi rgol ba thams cad chos dang ldan pas tshar
227a1(mdo sde): gcod pa bstan pa'o/ / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni bdud thams cad 'joms pa bstan pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa ni skye ba dang / shi 'pho dang / 'byung ba las
227a2(mdo sde): 'byung ba bstan pa'o/ / dran pa nye bar gzhag pas dran pa bstan pa'o// sdig pa thams cad med pas yang dag par spong ba bstan pa'o// lus dang sems yang bas rdzu 'phrul gyi
227a3(mdo sde): rkang pa bstan pa'o/ / dad pa sngon du 'gro bas dbang po bstan pa'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad kyis mi thub pas stobs bstan pa'o// 'thun par khong du chud pas byang chub kyi yan lag
227a4(mdo sde): bstan pa'o/ / 'byung bas lam bstan pa'o// sems zhi bas zhi gnas bstan pa'o// rnam par grol ba bskyed pas lhag mthong bstan pa'o// slu bar mi byed pas bden pa bstan
227a5(mdo sde): pa'o/ / don dang / chos dang / nges pa'i tshul dang / spobs pa dang mi gal bas so so yang dag par rig pa bstan pa'o// 'dus byas la smod pas mi rtag pa dang / sdug bsngal ba
227a6(mdo sde): yongs su brjod pa bstan pa'o/ / ya mtshan can thams cad spong bas bdag med pa bstan pa'o// mya ngan las 'das par grol bas zhi ba bstan pa'o// pha rol tu 'gro bas pha rol tu phyin
227a7(mdo sde): pa bstan pa'o/ / sems can yang dag par sdud pas thams cad thabs bstan pa'o// gnod sems med pas byams pa bstan pa'o// 'tshe ba med pas snying rje bstan pa'o// mi
227b1(mdo sde): dga' ba sel bas dga' ba bstan pa'o/ / bya ba byas pas btang snyoms bstan pa'o// nga rgyal med pas ye shes bstan pa'o// byang chub kyi sems bskyed pas dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung
227b2(mdo sde): me 'chad pa bstan pa'o/ / yang rjod med pas bde ba thams cad dang 'thun pa bstan pa'o// bstan pa'i bshad pa 'di bstan pa'atsho/ gang bdud rdzog can dang lhan cig tu lha'i bu gang dag gyus
227b3(mdo sde): pa de las/ lha'i bu lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes te/ de dag gis bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas kyis bstan pa de lta bu dang 'thun
227b4(mdo sde): par gyur cig ces de skad kyi tshig smras so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'dzum pa mdzad de/ kho bos 'dzum pa'i phyir zhus so// zhus nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka'
227b5(mdo sde): sprul to/ / kun dga' bo bdud kyi sprul pa'i dge slong 'di dag khyod kyis mthong ngam/ bcom ldan 'das la/ kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo //
227b6(mdo sde): bde bar gshegs pa mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'das des kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// kun dga' bo phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe lnga brgya'i tha ma la dam pa'i chos 'jig pa'i tshe//
227b7(mdo sde): nga'i bstan pa la dge slong dag phal cher 'di bzhin du sham thabs legs par ma gyon pa/ bla gos legs par ma bgos pa/ gos brtul te gyon pa/ lhung bzed chag pa/ shes bzhin
228a1(mdo sde): med pa/ spyod lam mi sdug pa/ lag na 'khar ba thogs pa/ sna leb leb po dang / zhar ba dang / 'theng po dang / zha bo dang / lus kyi sha tshugs ma legs pa
228a2(mdo sde): dang / nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kun dga' bo de ltar de'i tshe dge slong dag phal cher bsnyen bkur la ched che bar byed pa dang / rnyed pa dang
228a3(mdo sde): bkur sti la rten pa dang / bya ba sna tshogs kyis mi khoms pas brel ba dang / 'dul ba bor ba dang / so sor thar pa 'dral ba dang / mtshams las 'da' ba dang / tshe 'di ched che bar
228a4(mdo sde): byed pa dang / tshe rabs gzhan ched mi che bar byed par 'gyur te/ de dag 'di lta ste/ chos kyi phyir ma yin gyi/ bsnyen bkur gyi phyir zhar ba dang / 'theng po dang / zha bo dang
228a5(mdo sde): lus kyi sha tshugs ma legs pa dang / nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa 'ongs shing lhags pa rnams rab tu 'byin par byed do// snyen par rdzogs par byed do// kun dga' bo de ltar
228a6(mdo sde): de'i tshe nga'i bstan pa 'di ltar mi rung ba dang / mnyan du mi rung bar 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyang yid mi dga' bar 'gyur ro// bdud rnams ni yau rangs shing dga' ba dang /
228a7(mdo sde): btang snyoms su 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das la/ kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du na/ bdud sdig can rnams yi rangs shing dga' ba dang //
228b1(mdo sde): btang snyoms su 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo de ltar skyes bu blun po de dag bdag nyid bdud kyi las byed par 'gyur te/ de la bar chad bya ba'i phyir/
228b2(mdo sde): phyir zhing bdud sdig can brtson par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdud sdig can ni mi brtson pa rnams la glags mi tshol gyi/ bdud sdig can ni dge slong gang dag yang srid med par
228b3(mdo sde): bya ba'i phyir mgo'i thod la me 'bar ba bzhin du brtson par gnas pa de dag la bdud grags stsol te/ kun dga' bye de lta bas nas thob pa thob par bya ba dang / martogs pa rtogs par bya
228b4(mdo sde): pab dang / mngon du ma byas pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sbyor ba byos shig/ bsal bar byos shig/ 'bad par byos shig/ bdud kyi phyogs tshar chod cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
228b5(mdo sde): bstan pa 'bar bar byos shig/ dam pa'i chos yongs su zung zhig/ nga la chos kyi mchod pas mchod cig/ 'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa yin no// bstan pa 'di bstan pa'i tshe
228b6(mdo sde): dge slong lnga stong gis tshe'i 'du byed spangs par gyur te/ bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa mthong bar ma gyur cig ces de skad kyi chog smras nas/
228b7(mdo sde): de dag par snang du mngon par byung ste/ rang gi me'i khams kyi bdag nyid bsregs so// lha'i bu 'bum gyis kyang de dag la mchod pa byas par gyur to// dge slong nyis brgya ni rdul
229a1(mdo sde): med cing rdul dang bral te chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag go/ / dge slong nyis brgya ni len pa med par zag pa las sems rnam par grol lo// byang chub sems
229a2(mdo sde): dpa' sum khri nyis stong ni mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/ / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dag kyang 'khor dang bcas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga
229a3(mdo sde): na thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos rnam par 'jig pa mi mthong bar bgyi ba dang
229a4(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gang dag gi rna lam du grags par gyur pa de dag rnams kyang sems le lo'i dri mas kun nas mi gnas par bgyi ba dang / de dag bdud kyi las
229a5(mdo sde): byung zhing byung ba rnams kyi dbang du mi 'gyur bar/ bcom ldan 'das sku tshe ring du bzhugs zhing bskyang bar gsol/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa rdzu 'phrul
229a6(mdo sde): rnam par 'phrul pa dang / chos ston rnam par 'phrul pa las gang kho bos phyogs tsam zhig mngon sum du gyur pa ni de lta bu de dag yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa 'od srungs chen pos/
229a7(mdo sde): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul kha cig mngon sum du gyur to// tshe dang
229b1(mdo sde): ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bos mngon par shes te/ bcom ldan 'das mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon kho bos yang rab tu byung nas ring por ma lon pa zhig na/ 'jam
229b2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen srog shing gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ bcom ldan 'das blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang / bsnyen bkur bya ba'i
229b3(mdo sde): phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir dang po 'ongs par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyan du yod pa'i 'dze ta'i tshe la mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba 'dir dbyar tshul du zhugs so//
229b4(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'ang der dbyar tshul du zhugs na/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyar snga dang / dge 'dun gyi nang dang / bkad sa dang / gso sbyin dang / phyag 'tshal ba'i las
229b5(mdo sde): la kho bo cag gis phyis nam yang ma mthong bar gyur to/ / de nas dbyar zla ba gsum zad de 'das pa dang / gso sbyin dang / tshul nas 'byung ba'i tshe/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur
229b6(mdo sde): gyur pas bzhin bstan to/ / de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyed dbyar gyi zla ba 'di gsum du gang na 'dug 'dug/ des smras pa btsun pa 'od srungs
229b7(mdo sde): chen po mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po 'di nyid na rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i nang na'o/ / de la kho bo 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ sems can 'di lta bu ltung ba dang
230a1(mdo sde): @bcas pa dang / yongs su dag pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig tshul nas 'byung du mi rung ngo snyam du gyur nas/ kho bos khyams zlum po de nas byung ste/ 'jam
230a2(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bskrad pa'i phyir 'gan de brdungs so/ / der bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'jam dpal gnas
230a3(mdo sde): brtan 'od srungs chen po ci'i phyir 'gan de brdungs soms shig/ des gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsams na bdag bskrad pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsam
230a4(mdo sde): pa/ 'jam dpal khyod la ma dad pa chen po byed par mi 'gyur bar bdag nyid tshangs par byos shig/ rang gi spyod yul ston cig/ nyan thos chen po rnams mgu bar byos shig/ de na
230a5(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag par ston pa zhes bya ba la snyoms par zhugs so// 'jam
230a6(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu/ de nas de'i tshe phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na sbyangs pa'i yon tan smra ba'i 'od
230a7(mdo sde): srungs chen po 'dra ba sha stag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bskrad pa'i phyir 'ag na de brdung bar snang bar gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das des kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
230b1(mdo sde): 'od srungs ci'i phyir 'gan de brdung / bcom ldan 'das de la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de dbyar zla ba gsum du btsun mo'i
230b2(mdo sde): 'khor du gnas nas/ yongs su dag pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun dang lhan cig tshul nas 'byung bar 'tshal te/ de bskrad pa'i slad du bdag 'gan de brdung ngo // de nas bcom ldan
230b3(mdo sde): 'das kyi sku thams cad las 'od phyung ste/ kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs phyogs bcu na ci snang ba de ltos shig/ kho bos de'i tshe bltas na phyogs bcu na
230b4(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grang med gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed na/ gnas brtan bdag 'dra ba sha stag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bskrad pa'i phyir 'gan de brdung ba mthong ngo //
230b5(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad na yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug par mthong ngo // bcom ldan 'dra/
230b6(mdo sde): des/ kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs chen po khyod ci 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang nga'i mdun na 'dug pa 'di 'am/ 'on te gang dag phyogs bcu'i
230b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med tshad med pa na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung ni 'dug pa 'am/ gang bskrad par 'dod pa de'i tshe kho bo ngo tsha ba'i tshul gyis 'gan
231a1(mdo sde): de de sa la dor ro snyam na dor yang ma nus nas rgyun ma chad par sgra phyung ste/ 'dze ta'i tshal na ji lta ba de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na yang chang pa med pa lhag
231a2(mdo sde): pa med pa/ skyes pa med par de bzhin du byed par snang ngo // kho bos de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
231a3(mdo sde): bcom ldan 'das bdag ni ye shes phyogs gcig pa dang ldan pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' yul tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyi spyod yul ma 'tshal nas// 'gan de brdungs pa 'jam
231a4(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bzod pa gsol lo/ / bcom ldan 'das des kho bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'od srungs chen po khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'jam
231a5(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ji ltar mthong ba de thams cad du khyim pa'i khyim du sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir dbyar zla gsum du gnas so/ / 'od srungs chen po 'jam
231a6(mdo sde): dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di mnyan du yod pa'i grong khyer chen po 'dir btsun mo'i 'khor du dbyar tshul du zhugs pas kyang / rgyal po gsal rgyal gyi btsun mo'i 'khor las bud
231a7(mdo sde): med lnga brgya bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yongs su smin par byas so/ / skyes pa lnga brgya dang / khye'u lnga brgya dang / bu mo lnga brgya dang /
231b1(mdo sde): smad 'tshong ma lnga brgya yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldeg par bzhag go// sems can mang po dag kyang nyan thos kyi theg par btul te/ mtho ris su 'gro
231b2(mdo sde): bar byas so/ / bcom ldan 'das de la kho bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos ji lta bu zhig bshad pas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can de snyed cig
231b3(mdo sde): yongs su smin par bgyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'od srungs chen po de bas na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de nyid la chos ji lta bu zhige bshad pas sems can
231b4(mdo sde): de snyed yongs su smin par byas zhes khyod kyis dris shig dang / de nyid khyod la lan ldon par 'gyur ro// kho bos 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam
231b5(mdo sde): dpal khyod kyis chos ji lta bu zhig bshad pas sems can de snyed yongs su smin par byas/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po sems can de lta bu de dag ni
231b6(mdo sde): chos bshad pas yongs su smin par mi 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po sems can gang dag dga' ba'i rtsed mos yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'ang yod/
231b7(mdo sde): rab tu bzung ba dang / tshar gcod pa dang / sbyin pa rab tu sbyin pa dang / 'phongs shing dbul ba dang / bkod pa chen po dang / bshad pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i tshe
232a1(mdo sde): 'phrul dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / brgya byin gyi gzugs dang / tshangs pa'i gzugs dang / 'jig rten skyong ba'i gzugs dang / 'khor los sgyur ba'i
232a2(mdo sde): gzugs dang / sangs rgyas kyi sku dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi gzugs dang / nyan thos kyi gzugs dang / 'jigs pas sdigs pa dang / tshig rtsub po dang / tshig 'jam po dang / phan
232a3(mdo sde): gdags pas yongs su smin par 'gyur ba yang yod do/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po sems can gyi spyod pa ni sna tshogs pa ste/ de dag bya ba yang sna tshogs pa nyid kyi//
232a4(mdo sde): yongs su smin par 'gyur te/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de ltar yongs su smin pa'i sems can rnams phyis chos bshad pas shin tu dul bar 'gyur ro// de la kho bos 'di skad ces
232a5(mdo sde): smras so/ / 'jam dpal khyod kyis sems can gyi khams ji snyed cig spyod pa 'dis yongs su smin par byas/ des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po chos kyi dbyings ji snyed pa'o//
232a6(mdo sde): smras pa/ 'jam dpal chos kyi dbyings kyang ji snyed/ smras pa/ nam mkha'i khams ji tsam pa'o// smras pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyang ji tsam/ smras pa/ sems can gyi khams
232a7(mdo sde): ji snyed pa ste/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de ltar na chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / sems can gyi khams de gnyis su med de gnyis su byar med do// de la kho bos
232b1(mdo sde): 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jam dpal 'di ltar sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa med na/ 'o na sangs rgyas 'byung ba don med par mi 'gyur ram/ des smras pa
232b2(mdo sde): btsun pa 'od srungs chen po dper na skyes bu la la zhig mkhris pa'i rims kyis btab ste/ rnam pa sna tshogs su bla bar gyur pa dang / de la kha cig skyes bu 'di ni gdon gyis btab bo
232b3(mdo sde): snyam du gyur to/ / de nas sman pa mkhas pa zhig 'ongs te/ skyes bu de la mar thud pa la sogs pa'i bya bas mkhris pa'i rims de zhi bar byas nas/ de phyis rnam pa sna tshogs su
232b4(mdo sde): mi bla bar gyur na/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de ji snyam du sems de las lha 'am/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin byung bar 'gyur ba yod dam/ de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras
232b5(mdo sde): so/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang mar blud pa la sogs pa'i bya bas mkhris pa de ni zhi bar gyur to// 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po
232b6(mdo sde): skyes bu de la sman pa des phan pa chen po byas pa ma yin nam/ kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od
232b7(mdo sde): srungs chen po de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi gnas phyin ci log gi rims kyis btab pa dag/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes shing / bdag med pa la bdag tu mngon par chags
233a1(mdo sde): nasa'akhor ba na 'khor ro/ / de la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa dag 'jig rten du byung ste/ dpe bstan pa de dang de dag dang / chos
233a2(mdo sde): la 'jug pa'i sgo de dang de dag gis bdag tu 'du shes pa yongs su shes pa dang / phyin ci log spang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can de dag la chos 'chad do// de dag chos thos nas 'du shes
233a3(mdo sde): thams cad dang bral zhing phyi phyir zhing mngon par mi chags te/ de dag bdag tu 'du shes pa spangs nas chu bo las brgal te/ de dag brgal ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / yongs su
233a4(mdo sde): mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o/ / btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de ji snyam du sems/ de la bdag gam/ sems can nam/ srog gam/ skye ba po 'am/ gang
233a5(mdo sde): zag gang yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur pa yod dam/ kho bos de la smras pa/ 'jam dpal de ni ma yin te/ 'on kyang mnyam pa nyid yang dag par bstan pas phyin ci log spangs so//
233a6(mdo sde): 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i don ni mnyam pa nyid bstan pa'i don yin te/ skye ba don ma yin gyi/ 'gag pa don ma yin
233a7(mdo sde): gyi nyon 'ongs pa med par rtog pa nyi tshe don yin no/ / kho bos de la 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal byang chub sems dpa' gang dag rang bzhin de lta bu'i chos kyi dbyings la
233b1(mdo sde): yang rtog cing / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i go cha yang mi 'dor la/ zhum par mi 'gyur/ rangs par mi 'gyur zhing / rang bzhin gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'dra/
233b2(mdo sde): pa'i sems can rnams kyi phyir go cha bgos pa ni dka' ba byed pa yin no// des smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srungs chen po de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos
233b3(mdo sde): pa yin no/ / de la kho bos 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal khyod byang chub sems dpa'i ge cha brtsams par spobs par gyis shig/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ btsun pa 'od srung
233b4(mdo sde): byang chub sems dpa'i go cha chen po ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ go cha de dag bsgom pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod do// sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/
233b5(mdo sde): btsun pa 'od srungs chen po rmi lam gyi rang bzhin gyi mtshan nyid kyis/ 'khor ba tshad med pa yongs su 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// bdag med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/
233b6(mdo sde): sems can tshad med pa yongs su smin par byed par byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// chos kyi sku'i mtshan nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas tshad med pa la bsnyen bkur byed pa ni byang chub
233b7(mdo sde): sems dpa'i go cha'o/ / sgra brnyan dang mnyam pa nyid kyis/ chos sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa thams cad nyan cing 'dzin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// chos kyi dbyings su
234a1(mdo sde): 'du ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad bsrung ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// nyon mongs pa thams cad rang bzhin gyis yongs su dag
234a2(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ bdud thams cad 'dul ba ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// yod pa dang med pa sel ba'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ pha rol rgya
234a3(mdo sde): rgol ba thams cad chos dang ldan par shin tu tshar gcod pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ / phung po thams cad spong ba'i mtshan nyid kyis/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba ni byang
234a4(mdo sde): chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ tshul khrims dang / bslab pa dang / sbyangs pa'i yon tan gyi yo byad bsnyungs pa thams cad yang dag par
234a5(mdo sde): len pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ / khong khro ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ bzod pa dang / dul ba dang / des pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// lus dang sems dben
234a6(mdo sde): pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ blang ba med pa dang / dor ba med pa'i brtson 'grus ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// rten pa thams cad dbyen pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ bsam gtan
234a7(mdo sde): dang / rnam par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// ma rig pa'i gti mug gi lta ba yongs su dag pa'i mtshan nyid kyi
234b1(mdo sde): thogs pa med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o/ / bya ba thams cad ston pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ thabs chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// thog
234b2(mdo sde): pa med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ byams pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// sor mo lnga dang nam mkha' mnyam pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ snying rje chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o//
234b3(mdo sde): skyo ba med pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ dga' ba chen po ni byang chub sems dpa'i go cha'o// bde ba dang sdug bsngal bar mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ btang snyoms chen po byang chub sems
234b4(mdo sde): dpa'i go cha'o/ / rnam par grol ba'i lag mthil du 'ongs kyang thob par mi byed pa'i mtshan nyid kyis/ bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i mtshan nyid ni byang chub sems
