270a7(mdo sde): bsgoms nas ji srid cig lon/ dge slong gis smras pa/ ri 'dir phyin nas/ lo bzhi brgya'am/ lnga brgya tsam lon no// btsun mo man tes smras pa/ da dung bdag dang bdag gi
270b1(mdo sde): bar du 'dzin na/ nam zhig lam thob par 'gyur/ de srid du ri la gnas kyang rdo shing dang tha mi dad de/ bdag dang bdag gir mi 'dzin na/ gdod lam thob par 'gyur zhe'o// dge slong gis
270b2(mdo sde): smras pa/ bdag gis yang dag par don de lta bu mi shes so// de nas rgyal bus/ dge slong la smras pa/ btsun pa yul ya ba'i rgyal bu rgyal tshab don grub ces bya ba thos sam/ dge
270b3(mdo sde): slong gis smras pa bdag gis rgyun du thos kyi mthong ba ma yin no/ / rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni rgyal bu rgyal tshab don grub ces bya ba yin no// dge slong gis rgyal bu khyod gar 'gro//
270b4(mdo sde): ci 'dod ces dris pa dang / rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni theg pa chen po'i lam 'dod do zhes smras so// dge slong gis smras pa/ rgyal bu'i yon tan dang sbar na/ ring por mi thogs par
270b5(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i lam thob par 'gyur te/ rgyal bu bla na med pa'i byang chub mngon par sangs rgyas pa na/ bdag ni nye gnas rdzu 'phrul gyi mchog tu gyur cig ces smras nas/ rgyal bu khrid
270b6(mdo sde): de 'dug pa'i gnas bstan to/ / de nas dge slong gis chos bzhin du rgyal bu'i sgra blangs nas/ mdud pa bor nas/ zas su ni shing gi 'bras bu shing thog za/ skom du ni chu mig 'thung ngo //
270b7(mdo sde): de nas rgyal bus shing dang rtswa bsdus te/ bdag 'dug pa'i rtsa'i spyil po chung ngu ma cig byas/ btsun ma man te bu mong srong gnyis 'dus pa'i spyil po re re yang byas so// de'i tshe ma khye'u'i
271a1(mdo sde): ming ni yi ra zhes bya ste lo bdun lon nas/ gos rang gyon nus te/ pha'i phyi bzhin du 'gro'o// bu mo'i ming ni ge no yan zhes bya ste/ lo drug lon pas/ ri dgas kyi bag
271a2(mdo sde): pa gyon cing / ma'i phyi bzhin 'gre'o// ri de la gnas pa'i gcan gzan dang / ri dgas dang / 'dang/ chags bya la sogs pa thams cad kyang rab tu dga' nas/ rgyal bu la rten cing gnas
271a3(mdo sde): so/ rgyal bu ri de la phyin nas/ zhag gcig lon pa dang / sngon bskams pa'i chu mig dang rdzing yang chus gang bar gyur skye shing bskams pa rnams kyang / thams cad me tog dang 'dab
271a4(mdo sde): ma skyes par gyur te/ srin bu gdug pa rnams kyang med par gyur nas/ gcan gzan gcig la gcig za ba yang so so nas rtswa la za bar gyur/ 'bras bu'i shing rnams kyang rgyas shing bzang por
271a5(mdo sde): gyur bya sna tshogs snying rje'i skad kyi sgra skad snyan pa 'byin par gyur te/ btsun mo man tes ni shing gi 'bras bu dang / shing thog brda zhing rgyal bu la phul te/ sras mi srong gnyis kyang bstod do//
271a6(mdo sde): sras bu mi sring gnyis ni skabs skabs su pha ma gnyis dang bral te/ ha cang yang mi ring ba'i chu mig gi 'gram dag tu gcan gzan nam/ ri dgas dag dang lhan cig rtse ste/ bar 'ga' zhag lon par
271a7(mdo sde): yang rtse'o/ / phyis dus gzhan zhig na/ sras khye'u ya ri seng ge la zhon pa las/ seng ge brgal nas/ rngab cig bsnun pas/ sras bu'i gdong pa cung zad snad de khrag byung ba las/ spre'u zhig
271b1(mdo sde): gis shing gi lo ma blangs te/ gdong gi khrag phyis nas/ chu 'gram du khrid de khrag phyis pa yang rgyal bus rgyang ma nas mthong / de'i tshe yul ke'u le'u zhes bya bar bram ze dbul po zhig lo bzhi bcu lon
271b2(mdo sde): nas chung ma blangs so/ / chung ma ni rab tu bzang zhing sdug la/ bram ze de ni rab tu mi sdug pa'i mtshan ma bcu gnyis rdzogs par yod de/ de'i lus mdog sol ba ltar gnag la/ gdong la 'bur
271b3(mdo sde): 'bur po gsum yod pa/ sna 'khyor zhing mig gnyis shal ltar sngo ba/ gdong gnyer ma can la/ ma mchu 'phyang ba/ smra ba'i skad mi snyan pa// gsus po che la rku ba 'bur ba/ rkang pa gnyis
271b4(mdo sde): gyol ba/ mgo shub can la/ skra med pa 'dre ltar mi sdug pa zhig ste/ chung mas kyang mthong mi 'dod pa tsam du/ shi yang bla zhes rgyun du dmod mo byed pa zhig yod do// dus gzhan zhig na
271b5(mdo sde): chung ma de chu chur seng song ba las/ lam du khyo ba gzhon nu dag kha cig dang phrad nas/ khyo ba rnams kyis khyim thab kyi kha gzugs 'di 'dra'o zhes co 'dri zhing bgad nas/ khyod ni dpe
271b6(mdo sde): med par bzang zhing sdug na/ ji ltar 'di 'dra ba'i chung ma byed nus zhes smras pa dang / chung mas/ khyo ga de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// rgan po'i mgo ni shing la ba mo chags pa
271b7(mdo sde): ltar skya ba de/ nang nub shi bar dga' na/ shir mi btub/ ji ltar bya zhes chu snod thogs nas/ phyir khyim du 'ongs te/ khyim thab la 'di skad ces smras so// bdag chu chur song song
272a1(mdo sde): ba las/ lam du khyog gzhon nu dag cig dang phrad de/ de dag bdag la co 'dri zhing bgad pas/ da khyod kyis bkol ba'i bran yod na/ chu chu yang mi dgos te/ gzhan gyis
272a2(mdo sde): dpyas par yang mi 'gyur ro/ / khyim thabs kyis smras pa/ bdag cag ni shin tu yang dbul 'phongs pa yin na/ bran khol ga las rnyed par 'gyur/ chung mas smras pa/ gal te bdag gi phyir bran
272a3(mdo sde): khol ma btsal na/ bdag kyang 'gro ste/ khyod dang lhan cig mi gnas so// chung mas yang 'di skad ces smras so// kho mos thos na/ rgyal bu don grub sbyin pa ma 'os par byin pas/ yab rgyal po/
272a4(mdo sde): ringan tig ces bya bar spangs so// rgyal bu de la khye'u gcig dang / bu mo gcig yod ces grag gis/ khyod der slong du song zhig/ khyim thabs kyis smras pa/ ri dan tig ces bya ba 'di
272a5(mdo sde): nas dpag tshad drug stong lhag tsam gcig gis lam so yod la/ sngon la lung bgrod kyang ma myong na/ da ji ltar bgrod par bya// chung mas smras pa/ bdag gi phyir bran khol ma btsal na/ bdag
272a6(mdo sde): 'gegs te 'chi'o zhes smras pa dang / gnyis na kho bo ni gcig gis gsad kyang sla'o// khyod shi bar mi 'dod do zhes smras nas/ khyod kyis bdag slong du 'gro bar dang na/ kho bo'i brgyags dang dgra
272a7(mdo sde): pa sbyor cog ces bsgre'o/ / chung mas spras pa/ da song zhig brgyags dang dgos pa yang med de zhes smras na/ bram zes brgyags rang sbyar te/ rkang pas lam du zhugs te song ngo // de nas bram
272b1(mdo sde): ze yul ya ba zhes bya ba ga la ba der song ste/ der phyin pa dang / rgyal po'i pho brang gi sgor 'ongs nas/ sgo srungs pa la rgyal bu don grub da lngar ga la 'dug ces dris pa dang / sgo srungs de pho brang gi nang
272b2(mdo sde): du song nas/ rgyal po da ltar phyi rol na/ bram ze zhig rgyal bu don grub ga re zhes 'dri'o// rgyal pos rgyal bu ga re zhes smra ba'i chog thos pa tsam gyis sems 'khrugs shing khros nas/ 'di snyam du
272b3(mdo sde): 'di 'dra ba sha stag gi phyir/ nga'i sras spangs par gyur na/ de yang slong du 'ongs snyam bsams nas/ dpe 'di skad ces brjod par gyur to// dper na me ni rang bzhin gyis tsha zhing 'bar ba yin na/ de'i
272b4(mdo sde): steng du shing bsnan pa dang 'dra ste/ bdag kyang da ltar mya ngan gyis gdungs te me dang 'dra ba las/ da yang rgyal bu ga re zhes 'dri ba na me la shing gis bsnan pa dang 'dra'o// bram zes gsol pa
272b5(mdo sde): bdag ni lam ring po nas 'ongs pa yang / rgyal bu rgyal tshab mi'i yid dang mi 'gal bar sbyin pa bgyid do zhes ming snyan pa steng du gnam la thug/ 'og tu chu mig gi gting la thug gi bar
272b6(mdo sde): du grags pa/ bdag lam ring po nas re ba yod par 'ongs so// rgyal pos smras pa/ rgyal bu don grub na de ltar ri shin tu dben pa na gnas te/ rab tu dbul zhing ci'ang med na/ khyod la
272b7(mdo sde): ci zhig sbyin du yod/ bram zes smras pa/ rgyal bu la ci'ang med kyang / bdag phrad par dga' 'o zhes smras pa dang / rgyal pos kyang gzhan zhig la lam ston cig ces bsgo'o// de nas bram ze song
273a1(mdo sde): song ba las/ dan tig gi ro drung du chu chen po zhig yod par phyin nas/ rgyal bu 'ba' zhig bsam shing yid la byas pas/ chu'i pha rol tu phyin par gyur to// de nas bram ze
273a2(mdo sde): ri der phyin nas/ thog ma rngon pa zhig dang phrad do// rngon pa de la khyod ri de la rgyal bu don grub ces bya ba mthong ngam zhes dris pa dang / rngon pa des kyang rgyal bu sbyin pa la dga' bas bram ze 'di dag gi phyir ri/
273a3(mdo sde): la spangs par shes pas/ rngon pa des kyang bram ze bzung nas/ shing la bcings te/ brdegs pas lus la rma yang byung ngo // rngon pas yang smras pa/ khyod rgyal bu dris te ci zhig bya// mnga' 'phang ngo
273a4(mdo sde): zhes byas pa dang / bram ze de la 'di snyam du/ da ni 'dis bdag gsod yang dag na/ brdzun zhig bya'o snyam bsam nas/ rngon pa la khyod bdag la 'dri na ci nyes zhes smras so// de nas rngon pas/
273a5(mdo sde): 'o na ci zhig smra bar sems zhes dris pa dang / bram zes brdzun tshig 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal po yab rgyal bu mthong bar dga' bas/ bdag 'dir rgyal bu phyir 'gugs su 'ongs so zhes smras/
273a6(mdo sde): ma thag tu/ rngon pas kyang bkrol te btang nas sngar ma rtogs te/ rgyus ma shes so zhes bzod pa gsol nas/ rgyal bu gang na 'dug pa'i gnas bstan to// de nas bram ze de rgyal bu'i thad du phyin
273a7(mdo sde): pa dang / rgyal bus kyang rgyang ma nas bram ze 'ongs pa mthong nas/ rab tu dga' ba'i sems skyes te/ bsus nas gus par phyag byas te/ khyod galas 'ongs/ lam du nyon mongs shing ngal bar
273b1(mdo sde): ma gyur tam/ ci 'dod ces spro ba'i gtam byas so// bram zes smras pa/ bdag lam ring po nas 'ongs te/ lus thams cad rtse zhing ngal te/ bkres skom zhes smras pa dang / rgyal bus nang du
273b2(mdo sde): khrid nas stan la 'dug tu bcug ste/ shing thog dang / shing gi 'bras bu dang / btung ba'i skom mdun du phab nas/ bram zes kyang skom 'thung / shing thog zos te/ thal byung rgyal bu la 'di skad
273b3(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / bdag ni yul ke'u le'u zhes bya ba'i yul mi yin te/ snga zhig nas rgyal bu sbyin pa la dga' 'o zhes phyogs bcur grags shing thos pas/ bdag ni rgyal bu dbul 'phongs te/
273b4(mdo sde): rgyal bu la slong du 'ongs so// rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag la yod pa las khyod la ma byin na ni/ chags shing ser sna byed par yang 'gyur na/ bdag la ci bdog pa sngar btang bas/ da ni
273b5(mdo sde): ci'ang sbyin du med do/ / bram zes smras pa/ de ltar nor rdzas sbyin du med na/ khyod kyi bu gnyis bdag rgan po'i bkol ba 'am/ bran du byin cig ces de bzhin du lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du smras
273b6(mdo sde): nas/ rgyal bus kyang khyod lam ring po nas 'ongs la/ bdag gis bu gnyis 'dod pa rab tu legs kyis sbyin no zhes smras so// de'i tshe na bu mi sring gnyis rtser song song ba las/ rgyal bus bos nas
273b7(mdo sde): bu la 'di skad ces bsgo'o/ / bram ze 'di lam ring po nas bu khyed gnyis slong ngo zhes zer nas/ kho bos kyang sbyin pa yin gyis/ khyed gnyis 'di'i phyi bzhin song zhig ces bsgo ba dang / bu gnyis
274a1(mdo sde): rgyal bu'i mtshan du bros nas du ste 'di skad ces smras so/ / bdag cag gis bram ze du ma mthong na/ 'di 'dra bdag cag gis ma mthong ste/ 'di bram ze ma lags kyi/ yang /
274a2(mdo sde): dag par yi dgas lags pas/ da bdag cag gi ma shing thog tshol du mchis pa las/ slar ma 'khor bar bdag cag gnyis yi dgas 'di'i zas su sprul na// gdon mi 'tshal bar 'gum mo//
274a3(mdo sde): bdag cag gi ma slar mchis te/ bu dang ma mjal na/ ji ltar ba dang be'u bral ba ltar ngu zhing tshe nges 'debs te/ mi dga' ba'i mya ngan gyis gdungs par 'gyur ro// rgyal bus/ bu la bsgo ba
274a4(mdo sde): kho bos sbyin par gnang bas bsdad du mi rung ste/ 'di bram ze yin gyis/ yi dgas ma yin pas/ mi zas kyis/ khyed gnyis 'di'i phyi bzhin song zhig/ bram zes smras pa/ bdag ni da chas
274a5(mdo sde): te 'gro'o/ / gal te bu'i ma 'ongs na 'gror med de/ ma btang na rgyal bus bdag la byin pa'i dge ba'i sems bu'i mas zlog cing nyams par 'gyur du dogs so// rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag gis
274a6(mdo sde): sbyin pa ci byas kyang thog ma nas ci la'ang 'gyod pa'i sems byung ma myong ngo / / de nas rgyal bus chu snod thogs te/ bram ze'i lag par chu blugs nas/ bu gnyis kyi lag pa nas bzung ste/ bram ze la phul
274a7(mdo sde): ba na sa yang rab tu g.yos so/ / bu gnyis bram ze'i phyi bzhin mchir ma btub nas/ phyir rgyal bu'i drung du 'ongs te/ pus mo sa la btsugs nas/ pha rgyal bu la 'di skad ces gsol to//
274b1(mdo sde): bdag cag gnyis kyis tshe rabs snga ma la mi dge ba'i sdig pa ci bgyis nas/ 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal myong bar gyur/ bdag ni rgyal po'i rigs su skyes nas ci'i slad du pha rol po'i bran khol du gyur
274b2(mdo sde): ces pha rgyal bu la sdig bshags nas/ 'di'i rgyu 'di'i rkyen gyis sdig pa byang zhing / bsod nams skyes te/ gang nas gang du skyes kyang / 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal dang phrad par ma gyur cig ces
274b3(mdo sde): smras so/ / rgyal bus/ bu la smras pa/ 'jig rten mdza' zhing sdug ge cog mthar bye bral bar gyur te/ thams cad mi rtag pas yid brtan du mi rung / kho bos nam bla na med pa'i mnyam snyoms
274b4(mdo sde): pa'i byang chub thob pa na/ khyed thar pa'i don bya'o zhes bsgo'o// bu gnyis kyis/ yang yab rgyal bu la smras pa/ bus ni ma la mchi phyag bgyi ba lags na/ da gzhar yang mi phrad de/ ma'i ngo ma
274b5(mdo sde): mthong ba yang / bdag cag gi sngon gyi sdig pa'i las kyis gdungs par zad na/ bdag cag gi ma ci'i phyir mya ngan gyis gdungs shing / sdug bsngal bar mi 'gyur zhes smre sngags 'don to// bram ze
274b6(mdo sde): smras pa/ bdag rgas la nyam chung bas/ byis pa 'di gnyis bdag bor te/ ma'i thad du bros par gyur na/ bdag gis byar med par 'gyur gyis/ khyod kyis chings la bkris shig ces
274b7(mdo sde): smras pa dang / rgyal bus kyang bu gnyis kyi lag pa phying ka log tu bzung ste/ bram ze nyid 'ching du bcug nas/ phying ka log tu bcings pa'i theg pa bram ze'i lag par byin te sbrel nas khrid do//
275a1(mdo sde): bu gnyis ni de ltar khrid kyang 'gror ma btub ste 'then pa las/ bram zes lcag thogs te/ ded nas gzhus pa'i lam du khrag phyung ba'ang sa la chal par gang ngo // rgyal bus
275a2(mdo sde): de ltar mthong nas/ mchi ma byung ste/ mchi ma sa la bo bas/ sa yang bol bar gyur to// rgyal bu dang / ri dgas dang / gcan gzan mang po thams cad kyis bu gnyis bskyal te/ mi snang bar
275a3(mdo sde): gyur pa dang / gzod phyir log go// ri dgas dang gcan gzan la sogs pas rgyal bu bskyal te/ phyir rgyal bu dang rtse ba'i gnas su phyin nas/ snying rje'i skad phyung ste/ lus sa la rdebs shing
275a4(mdo sde): 'gre'o/ / bram ze des lam du zhugs te song song ba las lam khar skye shong zhig yod pa la bu gnyis btags te 'dug go// de nas chas pa dang bu gnyis pha ma dang phrad du ra nas/ shing gi phag la 'khri zhing
275a5(mdo sde): 'gror ma btub nas/ bram zes yang gzhus pa las/ bu gnyis kyis 'di skad ces smras so// bdag cag la ma rdeg cig/ bdag cag rang 'gro'o zhes gnam la yang bltas te/ yang 'di skad
275a6(mdo sde): ces smras so/ / ri gnyen gyi lha dang / nags tshal gyi shing lha rnams bdag cag la cung zad thugs brtse ba'i dgongs pa mi mnga' 'am/ bdag cag ni lam ring por gzhan gyi bran khol byed du 'gro ste
275a7(mdo sde): ma dang bral bar gyur na/ bdag cag gi ma ri la shing thog tshol zhing brdar btang ste/ myur du bdag cag dang phrad par shog cig ces mi sbran nam zhes/ de skad smras pa dang / bu'i ma ri la 'dug pa'i
275b1(mdo sde): rkang pa g.yon pa mthil g.ya' zhing g.yo ba dang / mig g.yon pa'ang 'gul/ nu ma gnyis nas nu zho'ang rang zag par gyur nas 'di snyam du 'di 'dra ba'i ltas ngan gna' nas ma byung na/ bdag gi bu gnyis
275b2(mdo sde): la ye 'drog ma byung ngam snyam bsams nas/ shing thog gis ci zhig bya snyam ste/ shing thog brda ba'ang btang nas/ myur bar phyir gnas su 'gro bar chas so// de'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i gnam gyi lha'i
275b3(mdo sde): dbang pos rgyal bus gzhan la bu byin par shes nas/ btsun mos dag par bsams pa'i sems kyi bar chad byed du dogs pas seng ge zhig tu sprul nas/ lam gyi srang du bsdad ngo // btsun mos/ seng ge
275b4(mdo sde): la smras pa/ khyod ni gcan gzan gyi rgyal po/ kho mo ni mi'i rgyal mo yin te/ ri la 'khod par 'dra na/ cung zad lam las byol te bdag thong zhig/ bdag la chung ngu ma shed ma bye ba gnyis shig yod de
275b5(mdo sde): da tsam gyi bar du ci'ang ma zos pas/ bdag 'ong du re ste sdod do// seng ges kyang bram ze de rgyang ring du thal bar shes nas/ lam las byol te btsun mo btang ngo // btsun mo phyir gnas su 'ongs
275b6(mdo sde): nas rgyal bu 'ba' zhig snang gi/ bu gnyis ma mthong bas/ bdag nyid 'dug pa'i spyil bur bltas na yang bu ma mthong / bu gnyis 'dug pa'i spyil por bltas na yang bu ma mthong ste/
275b7(mdo sde): de nas bu rtse ba'i gnas chu 'gram du btsal na yang ma mthong ngo // sngon bu dang rtse ba'i ri dgas sha ba dang / kha sha dang / gcan gzan seng ge dang / spre'u la sogs te/ mdun nas lus sa la
276a1(mdo sde): rdebs shing sgra 'byin la/ sngon rtse ba'i rdzing bu'i chu yang bskams par mthong nas/ phyir rgyal bu gang na ba der song ste phyin pa dang / rgyal bu la bdag gi bu gnyis ga re zhes dris na
276a2(mdo sde): rgyal bu cang mi smra'o/ / btsun mos yang smras pa/ bdag nam shing thog thogs te phyir gnas su 'khor ba nas/ bdag gi bu gnyis rgyang nas rgyug cing mdun du bsus te/ brdeg 'chos na yang phyir ladra
276a3(mdo sde): tedakyu mchong zhing / a ma 'ongs a ma 'ongs so zhes 'bod do// bdag 'dug pa na gnyis ka g.yas g.yon na 'dug cing / phrag pa 'am/ lus la rdul gos na yang 'phyi zhing sprug/ da bdag
276a4(mdo sde): gi bu ga re ma mthong na/ gzhan la ma byin nam/ 'di ltar ma mthong bas/ bdag gi snying gas par 'gyur gyis/ bdag gi bu ga la 'dug myur du smros shig/ bdag myos par 'gyur ro zhes
276a5(mdo sde): de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum gyi bar du dris kyang lan ma smras so/ / btsun mos yang smras pa/ lhag par sdug bsngal gyis gdungs te/ bu gnyis ma mthong ba lta tshod yod na/ rgyal bus lan
276a6(mdo sde): ma ster bas lhag par myos shing 'khrugs par gyur to/ / rgyal bus smras pa/ yul ke'u le'u zhes bya ba nas/ bram ze zhig 'ongs te/ bdag gi bu gnyis bslangs pa las/ bdag gis byin no//
276a7(mdo sde): btsun mos rgyal bus spras pa thos ma thag tu ri rdib pa ltar sa la 'gyel te/ 'gre zhing cho nges btab bo// rgyal bus spras pa/ re zhig sdod cig/ khyod sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ sangs rgyas mar
276b1(mdo sde): me mdzad kyi tshe dam ji ltar bcas pa mi dran nam/ de'i tshe de'i dus na/ bdag ni bram ze'i bu gzhon nu zhes bya/ khyod ni bram ze'i bu mo su ta ri zhes bya ste/ khyod ni de'i tshe me tog pad+mo bdun zhig thogs
276b2(mdo sde): bdag la dngul gyi dong tse lnga zhig yod de/ khyod las pad+mo lnga zhig nyos nas/ sangs rgyas la phul bar byas pa las/ khyod kyis pad+mo lhag ma gnyis po yang nga la byin te/ sangs rgyas la 'bul gyis
276b3(mdo sde): smon lam du yang / bdag skye ba pha rol tu rtag par khyod kyi chung mar shog cig ces smon lam btab pa las/ bdag de'i tshe khyod dang 'di skad ces dam ma bcas sam/ khyod bdag gir chung mar
276b4(mdo sde): dga' na/ bdag gi yid dang 'gal bar ma byed cig/ bdag sbyin pa zhig byed/ pha ma gnyis ma gtogs par gzhan sbyin yang / bdag gi yid bzhin du sbyin pa las 'gal bar ma byed cig ces
276b5(mdo sde): dam bcas pa las/ de'i tshe khyod na re/ de bzhin du bya'o zhes ma zer ram/ da khyod kyi bu gnyis gzhan la sbyin pa la bdag gi dge ba'i sems dkrug tu yang tso zhig yod ces rgyal bus smras ma thag
276b6(mdo sde): tubatsun mos thos pa tsam gyis/ sems dang yid kyi sngon gyi gnas dran pa'i mngon par shes pa tshor bar gyur te/ rgyal bu'i bsam pa myur du rdzogs par 'dod pas/ yid bzhin du sbyin pa
276b7(mdo sde): la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin rgyal bus sbyin pa byin pa ji ltar sems pa bsam pa'i phyir/ bram ze zhig tu sprul to// bram ze de'ang mi sdug pa rnam pa bcu gnyis dang
277a1(mdo sde): ldan te/ rgyal bu ga la ba der song nas/ 'di skad ces smras so// rgyal bu khyod sbyin pa la dga' bas/ pha rol po'i yid dang 'gal bar mi byed ces grag ste/ bdag kyang
277a2(mdo sde): ched du 'dir slong du 'ongs kyis/ khyod la btsun mo yod pa de bdag la byin cig/ rgyal bus smras pa/ shin tu legs te/ de bzhin du sbyin no zhes smras so// btsun mos smras pa/ bdag kyang pha rol
277a3(mdo sde): po la byin na/ rgyal bu'i g.yog sus bya/ rgyal bus smras pa/ da khyod kyang sbyin pa ma byas na/ ji ltar yang bla na med pa mnyam snyoms pa'i byang chub thob par 'gyur/ de nas rgyal bus chu snod
277a4(mdo sde): thogs te/ bram ze'i lag pa bkru ba'i phyir/ lag par chu blugs nas/ btsun mo'ang bram ze la phul lo// de ltar rgyal bu la 'gyod pa'i sems cung zad kyang med par brgya byin gyis rtogs
277a5(mdo sde): nas lha rnams kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ gnam sa'ang cher g.yos so// de nas bram zes btsun mo khrid de/ gom pa bdun tsam du phyin pa dang / phyir log nas btsun mo 'di rgyal bu la
277a6(mdo sde): phyir gdams kyis/ su la'ang ma byin cig ces smras so// rgyal bus slar smras pa/ ci'i phyir mi khrid/ mi 'dod dam/ ci mir skyes pa'i chung ma'i nang na/ chung ma 'di ni shin tu'ang bzang
277a7(mdo sde): zhing mdzes te/ rgyal po'i bu mo yin la/ rgyal po de la bu mo 'di gcig pu las med de/ chung ma 'di ni bdag la chu gang che bas/ kha zas btso ba dang / bsreg pa'ang lag dar te byed/ bza' ba dang
277b1(mdo sde): btung ba ngan kyang ngan ces mi 'khod do/ / rtag tu 'grub che la/ byad bzhing yang bzang la mdzes pas/ khyod khyer na bdag dga' 'o zhes smras so// bram zes/ rgyal bu la smras pa/ bdag ni bram
277b2(mdo sde): ze ma yin gyi/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po yin te/ ched du khyod bgam pa'i phyir 'ongs pa yin no zhes phyir brgya byin gyi lus bzang por bsgyur nas/ khyed ci dang cir smon ces smras so// de nas
277b3(mdo sde): btsun mos gus phyag 'tshal te/ smon lam rnam pa gsum zhig gsol te/ gang zhe na/ gcig tu bu khrid pa'i bram ze phyir yang bdag gi yul du phyin par gyur cig/ gnyis su na bdag gi bu gnyis
277b4(mdo sde): bkres pa dang skom pas sdug bsngal bar ma gyur cig/ gsum du na rgyal bu dang bdag cag gnyis kyang bdag gi yul du myur du 'khor bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang pos kyang
277b5(mdo sde): de bzhin du grub par gyur cig ces smras so/ / rgyal bus smras pa/ bdag ni sems can thams cad skye ba dang / rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal las sgrol bar gyur cig ces spon
277b6(mdo sde): lam btab pa dang / brgya byin lha'i dbang pos smras pa/ smon lam 'di ni shin tu'ang rgya che ste/ bla na med pa yin no// gal te mtho ris su skye zhing nyi zla la dbang ba'i bdag por 'dod dam
277b7(mdo sde): 'jig rten gyi rgyal por 'dod dam/ tshe ring zhing yun du gnas par 'dod na/ bdag gis sbyin nus kyis/ khyod kyis smras pa'i smon lam khams gsum las mchog tu 'das pa yin pas
278a1(mdo sde): bdag gis nus pa ma yin no/ / rgyal bus smras pa/ da ltar re zhig mchog tu phyug por gyur te/ sngon pas kyang lhag par rtag par sbyin pa byin zhing / yab rgyal po dang / blon
278a2(mdo sde): po rnams dang bdag cag phrad par shog cig ces smras pa dang / brgya byin gyis smon pa bzhin du nges par grub par gyur cig ces smras ma thag tu mi snang bar gyur to// yul ke'u le'u'i bram ze des byis
278a3(mdo sde): pa gnyis khrid de khyim du 'ongs na/ chung mas 'di skad du/ khyod ngo so 'di lta bus 'khor te 'ongs pa lta ngo mi tsha 'am/ byis pa 'di gnyis ni rgyal po'i gdung la gtogs pa yin na/ snying rje'i sems kyang /
278a4(mdo sde): med de/ 'di ltar btsogs brdegs shing / lus la rma dang rnag khrag gis btsog btsog ltar byas pa bzod dam zhes spyo brgyad nas/ byis pa 'di gnyis tshongs la/ bkol du rung ba khring shog cig
278a5(mdo sde): ces bsgo ba dang / khyim thab kyang chung mas bsgo ba bzhin tshong dus su song ba las/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po sprul te// tshong dus su 'ongs nas/ bram ze de la byis pa 'di ni shin tu rin che bas/ sul
278a6(mdo sde): nyo ma nus so zhes smras so/ / byis pa de gnyis bkres shing skom pa las/ brgya byin gyis lha'i rdzu 'phrul gyis lha'i dri bsung sprul te/ byis pa gnyis kyi ba spu'i khung bu nas lto 'grangs par byas te/
278a7(mdo sde): brgya byin gyis bram ze'i sems kyang bsgyur nas/ yul ya bar phyin par byas so// yul de'i blon po dang yul mi thams cad kyis rgyal bu'i sras/ rgyal po chen po'o tsha bo yin par mi shes pa
278b1(mdo sde): med pas/ yul mi thams cad mya ngan gyis gdungs te/ blon po la sogs pas bu 'di gnyis ga las 'ongs zhes dris pa dang / bram ze na re/ bdag gis bslangs te 'ongs pa la/ khyed kyis dror
278b2(mdo sde): ci yod ces smras so/ / blon po rnams kyis smras pa/ bdag cag gis yul du 'ongs pas na/ bdag cag gis 'dri bar rigs kyi/ mi 'dri ba ma yin no zhes blon po dang yul mi rnams kyis bgros
278b3(mdo sde): tebram ze las bu gnyis dbrog par byas pa las/ de'i nang nas khyim bdag gis 'di skad ces gros btab bo// 'di ni rgyal bus sbyin par bsams te/ sbyin pa 'di la rgyal bus bsams pa'i yid dang
278b4(mdo sde): 'gal zhing dbrog par mi rigs kyi/ nyos na rgyal po chen po la gsol na/ rgyal po chen po nyid kyis rin gyis slu bar 'gyur ro zhes byas pa dang / gros snga ma btang nas/ blon po rnams kyis// rgyal
278b5(mdo sde): po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / rgyal po chen po'i dpon po gnyis da ltar bram ze zhig 'tshong zhing mchis zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal pos tshig thos ma thag tu cher dngangs te bram ze dang bu gnyis pho brang
278b6(mdo sde): nang du khrid de shog cig ces bsgo nas/ bu gnyis po bram ze nang du 'ongs pa'i tshe/ rgyal po dang / btsun mo dang / pho brang gi slas dang / blon po rnams kyis bu gnyis mthong nas/ thams cad
278b7(mdo sde): dbugs kyis brnangs pa tsam du ma ngus pa med do/ / de nas rgyal pos bram ze de la khyod kyis bu 'di gnyis ji ltar thob ces dris nas/ bram ze na re/ bdag gis rgyal bu la bslangs te thob bo zhes
279a1(mdo sde): zer ro/ / rgyal pos byis pa gnyis 'ong bos te/ phang par blang snyam pa las bu gnyis 'ong du ma btub bo// de nas rgyal pos bu 'di gnyis kyi rin ji tsam 'dod ces dris na
279a2(mdo sde): bram zes smra ma khom par khye'us 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bdag bu pho ni dngul gyi dong tse stong dang ba glang zhig ri'o// bu mo ni gser gyi dong tse stong dang ba bzhon nyis brgya ri'o zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal
279a3(mdo sde): pos khye'u la 'di skad ces smras so/ / 'jig rten gyi chos kyis mi'i nang na pho ni rin po che dbyig ltar rin che ba yin na/ ci'i phyir bu pho ni rin chung / bu mo ni rin che bar 'debs/ bu khye'us gsol pa
279a4(mdo sde): pho brang gi slas lta bu rgyal po dang nye ba ma lags la/ ma rabs bran las slas su bzhes te/ de la thugs dgyes pas/ bkur zhing btsun par mdzad da/ rin po che'i gos skon zhing / bza' ba
279a5(mdo sde): dang btung ba ro brgya dang ldan pa bstabs nas/ sras gcig pu zhig mnga' ba ri la spangs te/ ya ba can pho brang gi slas dang rol cing / rol mo mdzad kyang / sras la cung zad tsam yang dgongs
279a6(mdo sde): pa'i thugs kyang ma mnga' bas/ de bas na bu pho ni rin chung la/ bu mo ni rin che bar mngon no// rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ lhag par mi dga' ba'i mya ngan skyes te 'di skad du/
279a7(mdo sde): bdag ni rab tu gnod na/ khyed ci'i phyir kho bo'i phang du mi 'ong / khyed nga la mi dga' 'am/ 'on te bram zes 'jigs zhes dris na/ byis pa na re/ bdag cag ni rgyal po chen po la mi dga'
279b1(mdo sde): ba 'am/ bram zes skrag pa'ang ma lags na/ thog ma rgyal po chen po'i tsha bo las/ da ltar mi'i bran khol du gyur pas/ gang na'ang mi'i bran khol rgyal po'i phang du 'dug pa'i chos med pas mi
279b2(mdo sde): spobs so/ / rgyal pos de skad ces smras pa thos nas/ lhag par mya ngan gyis gdungs par gyur te/ mi dga' bar gyur nas/ bus gsol pa bzhin du bram ze la rin byin cig ces bsgo nas/ bu gnyis
279b3(mdo sde): gdod rgyal po'i phang du blangs so/ / bu gnyis rgyal pos blangs nas/ phyag gis bu gnyis kyi mgo nas byugs te/ 'di skad ces smras so// khyed ri la gnas pa na/ zas su ni ci za/ gos su ni
279b4(mdo sde): ci gyon ces dris na/ bu gnyis na re/ zas su ni shing gi 'bras bu shing thog za/ gos su ni pags pa dang snam bu gyen te/ bya mang po dang rtse dga' bas/ mya ngan gyi sems med do zhes gsol to//
279b5(mdo sde): de nas rgyal pos bram ze de la phyi rol du song zhig ces bsgo ba dang / bu gnyis kyis/ rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to// bram ze 'di rab tu bkres skom gyis nyen na/ de la kha zas kyis
279b6(mdo sde): tshim par mdzad du gsol lo/ / rgyal pos smras pa/ khyed la mi dga' ba 'am/ khon du 'dzin pa med par/ phyir kha zas sbyin par sems/ bus smras pa/ bdag gi pha byang chub kyi lam
279b7(mdo sde): la dga' bas/ nor rdzas kyis sbyin du med de/ bdag gi lus kyis slong ba la byin pa'ang bdag cag la dbang ba'i bdag po lags te/ 'dis bdag cag la bkol ba'i las tsam byed du ma
280a1(mdo sde): bcug pa'ang / thog ma pas bsams pa ltar ma gyur te/ de snying rje'i sems tsam yang ma mchis te/ ltogs shing skom pa bzhin du 'dug pa 'di mig gis kyang su zhig gis
280a2(mdo sde): bzod/ bdag gi phas ni bu'ang mi 'phangs par pha rol po la sbyin pa byed na/ rgyal po chen pos mi gcig gi kha zas tsam la ser sna mdzad dam zhes gsol pa dang / rgyal pos kyang bram ze de la kha zas
280a3(mdo sde): kyis tshim par byin nas/ bram ze'ang rab tu dga' ste/ phyir bdag gis yul du song ngo // de nas rgyal pos/ rgyal bu 'gugs pa'i pho nya btang nas/ pho nya'ang de ma thag tu chas te/ rgyal bu ga
280a4(mdo sde): la ba der song ngo / / der phyin pa dang / chu zhig la ma thar nas/ pho nya des rgyal bu nyid yid la byas te/ bsams ma thag tu chu de las thar nas/ rgyal bu gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po'i bkas
280a5(mdo sde): rgyal bu slar yul du gshegs su gsol zhes bsgre'o/ / rgyal bus/ pho nya la smras pa/ thog ma rgyal pos lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du ri la sgoms shig ces bsgo ste/ da dung lo gcig ma tshang bas/
280a6(mdo sde): da lo tshang nas bdag 'gro'o zhes bsgo'o// de nas pho nya'ang phyir log nas/ rgyal po la de bzhin du gsol ba las/ rgyal po nyid phyag dar te yi ge bris nas/ phyir pho nya la bskur te/ 'di skad
280a7(mdo sde): ces bsgo'o/ / khyod ni mi'i nang na mkhas pa shes rab can yin pas/ 'gro ba la'ang bzod cing / 'ong ba la'ang bzod pa yin na/ ci'i phyir khros te 'ong du mi btub/ khyod dang lhan cig bza'
280b1(mdo sde): ba dang btung ba btang dgos kyis/ myur du shog cig ces pho nya 'gugs su btang ngo // de nas pho nyas yi ge thogs te/ rgyal bu gang na ba der song nas phyin pa dang / rgyal bu la yi ge phul lo//
280b2(mdo sde): rgyal bus yi ge blangs nas/ yi ge l-i phyag 'tshal nas/ lan bdun bskor ba byas te/ mod la phyir yul du 'gro bar chas so// de'i tshe ri de nas chas pa dang / ri de la gnas pa'i ri dgas
280b3(mdo sde): dang ga can gzan la sogs pa rgyal bu 'gro'o zhes thos nas/ thams cad lus sa la brdabs nas/ sa la 'gro zhing ngu ba'i skad phyung ngo // chu mig rnams kyang bskams te/ gcan gzan dang ri dgas
280b4(mdo sde): kyi phrug gu'ang mi nu/ 'dab chags bya mang po'ang snying rje'i skad kyis sgra phyung ngo // de nas rgyal bu gos gyon nas/ btsun mo dang 'grogs te phyir yul du song ba las/ dgra zla'i yul gyi rgyal
280b5(mdo sde): pos rgyal bu phyir 'ongs so zhes thos nas bal gyi glang po che dkar po la gser gyi sgras bstad de/ gser gyi snod du ni dngul gyi nye'us bkang / dngul gyi snod du ni gser gyi nye'us bkang ba
280b6(mdo sde): bshams nas/ rgyal bu bsu ba'i phyir nam mkha' la bstod de/ rgyal bu bsus nas/ rgyal po'i 'phrin du 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni mi shes pa'i dbang du gyur te/ rgyal bu las
280b7(mdo sde): bal gyi glang po che bslangs pas/ de'i rkyen gyis rgyal bu spangs par gyur pa de 'gyod pas na/ mthol tshangs su gsol lo// nga rgyal bu slar gshegs zhes thos nas/ rab tu dga' ste/
281a1(mdo sde): bal gyi glang po che de nyid kyang slar phul zhing gser dngul gyi nye'u rnams kyang phul na/ 'di dag rnams kyang bzhes shing / nongs pa'i skyon rnams kyang sbyang bar gsol to//
281a2(mdo sde): rgyal bus smras pa/ dper na mo zhig gos kha zas ro brgya dang ldan pa sbyar te/ pha rol po gcig la byin pa las/ mi des kha zas zos nas/ phyir sa la skyugs na/ phyir skyugs pa'i kha zas dri
281a3(mdo sde): bsung dang ldan te/ bzar rung bar 'gyur ram/ bdag gis sbyin pa byas pa'ang skyugs pa dang 'dra bas phyir mi 'dod do// pho nya khyod bal gyi glang po che 'di la zhon la bdag gi yul du song zhig
281a4(mdo sde): yul du khyod kyis rgyal po 'di ltar bdag bsu zhing / spro ba'i tshig gis snyan par smras pa la rab tu dga' 'o zhes gsol cig ces bsgo ba dang / pho nya de'ang bal gyi glang po che la zhon te/ phyir
281a5(mdo sde): bdag gis yul du song nas/ rgyal po la de bzhin du gsol ba las/ bal gyi glang po che de'i rkyen gyis 'thab pa'o dgra zla de gcig la gcig byams shing sdug pa'i sems su gyur te/ rgyal po dang /
281a6(mdo sde): yul mi thams cad bla na med pa'i mnyam snyoms pa'i sems bskyed par gyur to// de'i tshe rgyal po yab kyang bal gyi glang po che la bcibs te/ rgyal bu bsus so// rgyal bus mgo dang gdong
281a7(mdo sde): gos phyag 'tshal nas/ rgyal po'i phyi bzhin phyir yul du song ste/ yul mi thams cad kyang rab tu dga' mgu rangs nas/ me tog dang / bdug spos dang / ba dan dang / rgyal mtshan dang
281b1(mdo sde): bla bre la sogs pas mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bshams te/ sa gzhi'ang spos chus chag chag btab nas bsdad do// rgyal bu pho brang gi nang du 'ongs nas/ yum gyi drung du phyin pa dang / mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/
281b2(mdo sde): spro ba'i tshig gis snyun gsol to// de nas rgyal pos rin po che'i bang mdzod thams cad rgyal bu la gtad de/ yid bzhin du sbyin pa byed du bcug nas/ sbyin pa snga ma bas kyang lhag par rgyun ma chad par sbyin
281b3(mdo sde): pa byed du bcug pas/ mngon par sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das kyis/ kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ ngas sngon gyi sbyin pa byas pa mngon du dran pa ni de lta bu
281b4(mdo sde): yin no/ / de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu don grub ces bya ba ni da ltar nga nyid yin no// de'i tshe yab rgyal por gyur pa de ni da ltar nga'i yab rgyal po zas gtsang ma yin no// de'i tshe yum du gyur pa de ni nga
281b5(mdo sde): ltar yum lha mdzes yin no/ / de'i tshe na btsun mor gyur pa de ni da ltar grags 'dzin ma nyid yin no// de'i tshe dge slong a tsu ta zhes bya ba da ltar mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po yin no// de'i tshe brgya byin lha'i
281b6(mdo sde): dbang por gyur pa de ni da ltar shA ri'i bu yin no/ / de'i tshe rngon par gyur pa ni da ltar kun dga' bo khyod yin no// de'i tshe khye'u ya ra zhes bya ba ni da ltar nga'i sras sgra gcan 'dzin yin no// de'i tshe bu mor gyur
281b7(mdo sde): pa de ni yum sru go'u ta mo zhes bya ba yin no/ / de'i tshe bram ze slongs mo pa de ni da ltar lha sbyin nyid yin no// de'i tshe bram ze'i chung mar gyur pa de ni da ltar bram ze mo tsan tsam na yin no// de ltar nang
282a1(mdo sde): shin tu byed dka' ba'ang grangs med/ dpag tu med/ dge ba'i las byas pa yang grangs med/ dpag tu med de/ de bas na mdo sde 'di dge slong dang bram ze la sogs pa la rgyas
282a2(mdo sde): bar ston cig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sbyin pa byas pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di lta bu dag yin no// 'phags pa rgyal bu don grub kyi mdo zhes bya ba'i bam po gcig
282a3(mdo sde): rdzogs so/ / / sngon rgya las 'gyur ba'i brda rnying par 'dug/ @bod skad du/ 'phags pa rgyal bu kun tu dge zhes bya ba
282a4(mdo sde): theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ni/ sngon yul dbus
282a5(mdo sde): 'gyur tshal gyi rgyal po shing rta bcu pa'i sras rgyal bu kun tu dge zhes bya ba zhig tu skyes pa'i tshe skye bo yongs kyis kyang bkur bar gyur to/ / 'phong rtsal dang / yig rtsis dang / bzo dang
282a6(mdo sde): sman dpyad dang / rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas shing gsal ba cog skyes pa'i tshe/ rgyal pos sras la bstod pa ni/ rigs dang gzugs byed mdzangs dang ldan// shes gsal mkhas shing spyod
282a7(mdo sde): lam mdzes/ / shel ltar gsal ba'i sa gzhi la// zla ba'i 'od zer shar ba 'dra// nyid skyon mun pas mi gnas shing // yon tan rin chen mdzod du 'gyur// mthong na skye bo nyams dga' ste//
282b1(mdo sde): thams cad yid dang ldan gyur to// gzhon nu rnams kyi slob dpon du gyur pa skyes pa'i tshe/ yab rgyal po ni sku na so'ang bgres pa'i steng du bsnyun drag po cag kyang btab ste/ 'jig rten mi yul 'di ru
282b2(mdo sde): yun ring po gnas gnas mi 'dra nas/ sras kyis yab la phan dam pa cig gdags na cis gdags snyam pa'i rjes la// ring por ma lon par yab 'das par gyur nas/ 'bangs rnams kyis rgyas
282b3(mdo sde): bu la rgyal srid ma phul gyi skabs su/ rgyal bu rab tu byung ste/ nags tshal dben par drang srong gi spyod pa la zhugs te/ tshangs par tshul bzhin du spyod do// re zhig na 'bangs rnams kyis
282b4(mdo sde): rgyal bu la rgyal srid dbul bar bshams pa las/ rgyal bu rab tu byung ba mthong nas/ rgyal khams kyi mi yul yongs su ma he be'u stor ba 'am/ nya thang la lhung ba bzhin 'gre ldog cing
282b5(mdo sde): smre sngags kyi tshig las kye ma'o/ / lus srog skyong ba'i rgyal po yab 'das nas// 'bangs rnams kyang mya ngan gdungs pas non// da ni sras kyang rab tu byung nas ni// 'jig rten 'di ru nyi nub mun gyis
282b6(mdo sde): bsgribs/ / kyi hud kyi hud ces smre sngags 'den pa'i cho ga las/ ring po ma lon par 'bangs rnams kyis rgyal bu la yang zhus pa/ kye rgyal po lags/ lus srog skyong ba'i rgyal po yab 'das nas/
282b7(mdo sde): 'bangs kyis rgyal srid lugs bzhin ma phul ba// khri len chos bzhin chad pa nod// mes dang yab kyi mdzad lugs bzhin// rgyal srid bzhes la 'bangs rnams skyongs// rgyal po yab
283a1(mdo sde): kyi bka' yang de lags te/ / 'bangs rnams kun kyang de bzhin spyan sngar mchi'o// de skad ces zhus pa las/ rgyal bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag ni 'di ltar
283a2(mdo sde): yab rgyal po ma 'das pa nas rab tu 'byung bar dam bcas pa lags/ / da ni slar ldog par mi nus so// bdag gis bdud rnams bcom nas ni// gzhan gyi sdug bsngal bsal ba'i phyir// yi dam
283a3(mdo sde): chen por bcas pa yin/ / slar yang ldog par mi nus kyis// blon po khyed rnams kyi nang nas gang mdzangs shing drang ba gcig gis rgyal srid zung zhig ces gsol pa dang / blon po rnams kyis
283a4(mdo sde): slar gsol pa/ 'bangs kyis rgyal srid 'dzin pa ni// sngon chad med srid da byung bas// lugs med mkhos su mi rung bas// gzhan du smras na ngo tshar rung // zhes zhus pas/ yang rgyal bus
283a5(mdo sde): gsol pa/ khong nas thang la bor zin pa'i// mchil ma'i thal bar gyur pa de// sngar la blangs nas 'thung byed pa// dpe zla gzhan la ga na yod// skad cig sgyu ma'i rgyal srid ni// mchil
283a6(mdo sde): mthang la bor ba 'dra'o/ / phyogs mtshams skyong bar byed pa dang // rgyal khams skyong bar byed pa gnyis// snying rje tsam du 'dra mod kyang // de gnyis khyad par bsam las te// mtsho
283a7(mdo sde): dang glang rjes snyoms pa 'dra/ / rab tu byung nas log pa dang // log par lta ba'i sdig mthong na// shin tu 'jigs shing smyig yar rung // gnyis ka phung byed ma smra bar// blon po
283b1(mdo sde): rnams kyang phyir la deng / / de skad ces gsol pa dang / blon po rnams kyis bsam pa la/ lha sras chos la mkhregs pa'i steng du/ 'o skol 'bangs su gyur pas// tshig gsan du mi bzhed na/
283b2(mdo sde): da ji ltar bgyi zhes bgyis pa dang / sngon yab kyi thugs grogs po/ yul bar rtan rgyal po dga' ba'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ des rgyal bu rab tu byung ba la gros btab na/ rgyal srid
283b3(mdo sde): 'dzin du btub par nges so snyam nas/ rgyal po dga' ba'i 'od kyi spyan sngar mchis te 'phrin btang / phyag bgyis// zhus gsol pa/ kye rgyal po lags/ bdag cag yul dbus 'gyur
283b4(mdo sde): tshal gyi rgyal po shing rta bcu pa ni 'das/ sras rgyal bu kun tu dge ni rab tu byung nas/ rgyal sa ni stongs/ 'bangs rnams ni sil bur gyur na/ de rgyal bu rab tu byung ba las slar phab ste/ rgyal
283b5(mdo sde): srid 'dzin du mi gzhug tu mi rung / de skad ces gsol pa dang / rgyal po dga' ba'i 'od kyang thugs la gcags nas/ 'khor blon po dang bcas nas/ rgyal bu rab tu byung ba'i spyan sngar
283b6(mdo sde): mchis te 'phrin btang / phyag bgyis/ zhus gsol pa/ kye btsun pa lags/ sku na tshod de tsam la/ gzhon pa rnams la'ang mi gzigs sam/ khyim bzangs dpal dang 'dra ba bor nas
283b7(mdo sde): niri dgas bzhin du nags tshal dben par 'khyams/ / mtho btsun rgyal po'i lus bor nas// dbul po'i lus kyang nye bar blangs// ngan pa'i gos gyon skye bo yongs kyis 'phyas/
284a1(mdo sde): long spang bzhin du grong khyer spongs mos 'debs// dus 'dir khyod kyi gnas skabs 'di la ni// bltas nas dgra yi mig kyang mchi mas khengs par 'gyur// yang na spyos
284a2(mdo sde): sam bgegs kyis bslus par nges/ / de lta mya ngan dbang du ma gyur par// rgyal srid bzhes la 'bangs rnams skyong du gsol// rgyal po yab kyi bka' yang de lags te// 'bangs rnams
284a3(mdo sde): kun kyang de bzhin spyan sngar mchi'o/ / de skad ces smras pa dang / rgyal bus slar gsol pa/ kye rgyal po lags/ dper na mi lto 'grangs pa la kha zas kyi gtam zer ba yi gar mi 'ong ba dang 'dra
284a4(mdo sde): bar bdag dad pa skyes nas rab tu byung ba la/ slar zlog pa'i gros ngan pa 'debs pa 'di ni thi bur yang ma legs so snyam nas yang zhus pa/ kye rgyal po lags/ khyod kyis smras pa'i
284a5(mdo sde): tshig de rnams/ / byams te smras par yin shes kyang // bdag gi don dang shin tu 'gal// nags tshal dben pa gcig pu'i brjid mthong na// rgyal po 'khor//
284a6(mdo sde): mangs longs spyod sgyu ma grog tshang 'dra// tsaM ber tshems can dag gi brjid mthong na// dar ber klubs pa sgyu ma'i 'ja' tshon 'dra// brtan po dag thub tshe mthar gtugs mthong na// srog
284a7(mdo sde): lus yal bar 'dor ba smyon pa 'dra/ / skyon sel mgo mang 'dul ba'i rlabs mthong na// gzhan tshon 'dra byed byis pa'i rtsed mo 'dra// kye rgyal po chen po da yang snyan gson cig/ khyim gyi
284b1(mdo sde): so nam bya ba la/ / bya thag chad pa gnyis yod de// snga ma bsams pa sdug bsngal yin// phyi ma bsams pa sha thang ngo // 'jig rten 'di ni che btsan phyugs dregs kyang // 'chi bdag dbang du
284b2(mdo sde): ma gyur gang yang med/ / tshe 'di srid la zhe don rgya che yang // yun gyi chos 'dod rgyal srid ma shes na// skra dkar skyes shing gnyer ma'i tshogs 'dus kyang // byis pa shed ma bye dang ci ma 'dra//
284b3(mdo sde): don la mkhas pas brtags pas sems can snying re rje// kye rgyal po lags/ da yang snyan gson cig/ skyon rnams sgyu mar rtogs pas dgral zhe mi sdang // yon tan sgyu mar bshad pas
284b4(mdo sde): gnyen la dang mi chags/ / gnas su nges pa med pas spyugs pas nyam mi nga // sems la skye shi med pas bsad pas 'jigs pa med// nor du nges pa med pas dbrog pas nyam ming //
284b5(mdo sde): dpal gyi ri la srid kyi chu brag kyang // 'grogs pa'i grogs po bla med byang chub bzang // gser gyi ri la g.yu yi khron babs kyang // nor gyi dbyig tu sems kyis chog shes bzang // stong zhing
284b6(mdo sde): dben pa'i gnas ni yun du bde/ / chog shes khrel 'dzem gos ni kun la snyoms par dro// mi rtog rnam grol zas ni sman dang bcud// yang dag bde bar 'tsho yis rgyal po khyod kyang deng //
284b7(mdo sde): de skad ces gsungs pas/ rgyal po dga' ba'i 'od kyis bsams pa/ btsun pa dad pa skyes nas rab tu byung ba la/ slar zlog pa'i gros ngan pa 'debs pa 'di ni thi bur yang ma legs so snyam nas
285a1(mdo sde): yang zhus pa/ kye btsun pa yon tan chen po'i gnas khyod la// blo gros ngan pas 'khrul te ma rig nas// nongs pa chen po smras pa'i tshig de rnams// thugs rje chen po'i
285a2(mdo sde): sku la bzed par gsol/ / bdag kyang rab tu 'byung bar cig nang lags// zhes zhus pas/ rab tu 'byung bar gnang nas/ sgra dang kha spu bregs te/ gos ngur smrig gyon nas/ rgyal bu'i g.yas
285a3(mdo sde): gral du gnab par gyur to/ / de'i tshe 'bangs rnams kyis bsam pa las/ rgyal khams gnyis kyi rgyal po rab tu byung ba las bsams na/ dam pa'i chos bya ba 'di bzang bar yid ches nas
285a4(mdo sde): bdag cag kyang rab tu 'byung bar ci gnang zhes zhus pas/ rab tu 'byung bar gnang ste/ skra dang kha spu bregs nas/ gos ngur smrig gyon nas/ rgyal bu'i g.yon gral du gnang bar gyur to// de'i
285a5(mdo sde): tshe de'i dus na/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis/ sa bon ma btab par rtse shing dang nags tshal thams cad kyang zas dang skom du gyur to// de'i tshe de'i dus na/ rgyal bu kun tu dge rab

285a7(mdo sde): blon po dang 'bangs rnams rab tu byung ba ni gzhan du ma sems shig/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa rnams so// rgyal bu kun tu dge rab tu byung ba'i sku'i yon
285b1(mdo sde): tan gyis rgyal khams gnyis kyi blon po dang 'bangs rnams mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / @rgya gar skad du/ spri bi ro pa ni man tra na/
285b2(mdo sde): bod skad du/ gnas brtan spyan drang ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// btsun pa rnams dgongs su gsol/ dgongs nas kyang shel dang / nor bu dang / dngul dang / ku mu da
285b3(mdo sde): dang kha ba'i phung po dang / zla ba'i zer dang / ston gyi chu dang / nam thang ba dang / pad+ma'i rtsa lag ltar dri ma med par mdzod la/ rlung gi stobs kyis shing gi lcug phran bskyod pa dang / smig

285b6(mdo sde): bas kyang / / gang go dba' rlabs 'gyur la bskrun med par// 'jig pa thogs med g.yo ba'i yid de ni// yud tsam rtse gcig mdzod cig btsun pa rnams// lha yi bu mo yid chad shugs
285b7(mdo sde): phyung skad cig zim mer byas pa'i mig/ ring zhing rdzi ldan bkral 'od zer mig chags lta ba'i g.yo ba yis// gang gi thugs ni skye ba rgyun gcod rgyu las 'khrugs par ma gyur pa// bdud rtsi
286a1(mdo sde): dpung 'joms mkhas gcig thams cad mkhyen pa de la phyag mdzod cig/ skye ldan gang du brten nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas sems dmyal ma zhi dang // yi dgas 'jig
286a2(mdo sde): rten gnas su 'gro bar mi 'gyur sdug bsngal 'jig byed pa/ / 'khor ba dag na 'gro ba chen po rnams kyi grogs 'gyur 'phags gcig pu// zhi bde grong khyer sgor gzhol/ chos de la ni gus pas
286a3(mdo sde): sten par mdzod/ / zhi ba'i bdag nyid gang zhig bde gshegs gsung rab mthar phyin 'byung smra zhing // gang la gus par cung zad tsam zhig byin yang sbyin pa 'phel 'gyur la// ye shes snang bas mun
286a4(mdo sde): pa zad byas dge slong dge 'dun de la ni/ / nyon mongs gcod pa'i ched du thams cad kyis kyang gus par phyag mdzod cig/ lcang lo chun po'i sku mang mgo la thogs shing dpung mgo gnyis yog la//
286a5(mdo sde): rang gi 'od zer phyogs mthar 'phro ba rnams kyis 'jig rten kun 'gengs pa// lha dbang brgya byin cod pan btud de tshangs la phyag bya gang yin de// byin nas dga' byas sems kyi ting 'dzin shin tu
286a6(mdo sde): chen po'i 'bras bu yin/ / rdo rje 'od 'phro 'phreng bas dpung rgyan 'dres nas mdzes gyur cing // lha la bka' stsol dbang po mtho ris skyong ba gang yin pa// de dag dge ba dag 'byung rnam smin 'gyur/
286a7(mdo sde): dus nyams dga' zhing // mngon par 'dod pa'i 'bras bu phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu rnam yin// kha nas rgyags 'gyur dri zhim 'byung zhing mig gi mtha' dmar la// dbugs 'byung do shal g.yas
286b1(mdo sde): pas nu ma 'bur la 'drud byed pa/ / sdug gu lhan cig nor bdag dga' tshal 'dug pa gang yin pa// de yang 'gro nyams dga' sbyin pa'i bdag nyid chen po yin// 'brug sgra sgrog cing sprin rnams chu ni//
286b2(mdo sde): kun tu len byed pa// rlabs 'byung dus na nor bu byu ru dung dang nya phyis 'byung // rin chen gnas ni chu la nyid kyi 'byor pas gang srung ba// der yang rgyu ni sbyin pa mchog ces thub pas bka' stsal
286b3(mdo sde): to/ gang yang 'od zer rnams kyis mkha' la skar ma'i 'khor lo zil mnan cing / ku mu da yi rdzing yangs rnams su dpal ni rab tu rnam phye nas// glang po'i che ba'i dpal dang ldan zhing
286b4(mdo sde): mtshan mo shin tu rab mdzes pa/ / de yang nges par sbyin pa nyid kyis 'bras bu ro bro mang po yin// raM reb rtse la shing rtas lam ka 'dug pa'i rin chen rdo gcog cing // rta yi rkang lag rnams
286b5(mdo sde): kyi dgu tshig chu bo'i rlabs ni gcod byed la/ / mun pa bsal phyir nyi mas skar ma zil mnan lam me gang yin pa// de rgyu yid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi bskyed pa'i sbyin par thub pas gsungs//
286b6(mdo sde): rgyal mtshan rtser gtags rin chen 'od zer snang ba nam mkha' dmar gyur cing // rta rmig 'dor bas mkha' la sprin gyi 'phreng ba dag kyang 'dral byed la// rnga yab dkar pos g.yabs
286b7(mdo sde): shing 'khor los sgyur ba song ba gang yin pa/ / 'dod pa'i 'bras bu de yang sbyin pas bsgrubs zhes thub pas bka' stsal to// gser gyi pad+ma'i rdul gyi phye mas dmar bris mtshor ni khrus

287a2(mdo sde): ser sna 'jil zhing skyon med dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i gzi brjid yin/ / mA la yi ri rtse tsan dan grib mas bsil ba yangs pa dang // 'bigs byed ri dang gangs dang lhun po'i ri dang man+da ri'i bo la
287a3(mdo sde): grub pa'i tshogs chen chung ma lan cig 'jigs bral dga' ba gang yin pa/ / 'dod pa'i 'bras bu tshe 'di'i snying po 'byor pa de yang gtong ba'i yin// bud med rkang gdub 'khrol ba'i 'grogs

296b3(mdo sde): goms pa'i chu blugs pas mi shes pa'i sems kyi dri ma bkrus pa'i khams pa'i tshogs 'dus pa/ nyi ma shin tu mang po dang nas 'dris pa'i srid pa'i spros pa bcad pa/ bde bar gshegs

296b5(mdo sde): gi tshogs bsags pas grags pa/ rgya che ba dang ldan pa// sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid chen po can/ ston gyi nam thang ba lta bu'i yid dang ldan pa/ ming 'di zhes bya ba 'di'i gan du/ ma ha'i
296b6(mdo sde): rwa ltar sngo zhing dri med mkha' las 'phur/ / gzi brjid kyis ni nyi ma'i 'od stong 'thor zhing mngon du phyogs nas 'ong ba'i sprin ni dral nas su// skye bo phan phyir thub rnams sang 'dir gshegs su
296b7(mdo sde): gsol/ / rgyun mi 'chad par ting nge 'dzin dang / klog pa dang / 'chang ba dang / skye bo bla ma la sten par mngon du dga' ba'i blo gros dang ldan pa/ mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam gyi rjes
297a1(mdo sde): su 'thun pa'i kha na ma tho ba med pa'i rig pa gsum rab tu sgrub pa/ nyon mongs pa las grol bar 'dod pa'i dge slong gang dag 'di na gnas pa/ 'dul ba'i cho ga la
297a2(mdo sde): goms pa/ lus dang / ngag dang / yid kyi 'jug pa zhi ba dang ldan pa de dag kyang ma lus par ci bder do mod kyi mtshan mo zad par mdzod la 'di nyid du gnas par mdzod cig/ thub pa'i
297a3(mdo sde): sras mo shes rab zhi dang dul bas brgyan pa'i dge slong ma/ / tha dad gling dang klu dang nags dang ring gnas spros pa'i bsam bral zhing // 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dri bral mchod 'os
297a4(mdo sde): 'gro ba'i ma lta bu/ / de dag dgyes par mdzod la sbyin pa dag par bzhed pas sang 'dir spyon// phyag na rdo rje la sogs la gnod sbyin gtso bo dang // grub pa rnams dang gang dag lha ma
297a5(mdo sde): yin dang klu rnams dang / / sangs rgyas la ni rab tu dad pa'i lha mchog gang yin pa// de dag rnams kyang sbyin bdag 'di la phan phyir sang spyon cig/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang
297a6(mdo sde): rig sngags 'chang dang / grub pa dang / mi 'am ci dang / nam mkha' lding la sogs pa 'byung po chen po rnams dang / stobs bcu mnga' ba'i bstan pa'i yon tan sgrub pa dang ldan pa rnams
297a7(mdo sde): kyis kyang dam pa'i chos gnas par bya ba dang / sbyin bdag chen po bdag nyid che ba 'di snod bzang po la sbyar ba dang / sbyin pa chen po 'di la grogs bgyi bas nyid kyi dge ba'i yon
297b1(mdo sde): tan bskyed pa la nan tan mdzod cig/ rgyun mi 'chad par bsrung ba dang / bskyab pa la brtson par mdzod cig/ yang dul ba dang / tshul khrims dang / thos pas shin tu che ba'i 'phags
297b2(mdo sde): pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun 'dus pa la gsol pa 'tshal lo/ / lhun po las byung sbrul mgo lnga 'dra rdo rje ka na ka/ nya dang gdugs dang 'khor lo dag dang lcags kyu'i mtshan mnga' ba// pad+ma/
297b3(mdo sde): gser gyi dpal ldan phyag sor dra ba srab mos 'brel// sen mo 'od kyis khyab pa rgyal ba'i phyag gis bskyab par shog/ srid pa'i 'dod chags nyon mongs zhags pa bsal cing sred med
297b4(mdo sde): la/ nga chu yi chu gtor lta bur yon tan rnams kyi gnas gcig po// thub pa'i sras mchog dge 'dun bdag gis gus pa spyan drangs pas// de ring dge ba gang bsags des ni byang chub thob
297b5(mdo sde): gyur cig/ ji srid mkha' la 'od dro 'od kyis gsal ba rnam par snang byed cing // ri dgas rtags can 'od kyi rigs pa'i dkyil 'khor ldan la 'char ba dang // rgya mtsho rgyas par
297b6(mdo sde): gnas pa de srid lha dang lha min phyag byas pa'o/ / bde bar gshegs kyi bstan pa thog pa med pa sa la gnas par shog/ gnas brtan spyan drangs pa rdzogs so//
297b7(mdo sde): Atsur+ya dzi na mi tra dang / bin+d+he ye shes sdes bsgyur te gtan la phab pa// rgya gar skad du/ dAd sha lo tsa na sU tra/ bod skad du/ mig
298a1(mdo sde): bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba'i mdo grub par grub cig/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer 'od ma'i tshal na bzhugs/ de'i tshe glog byung / skar
298a2(mdo sde): mda' lhung / gnam lcags bab pa dang / de nas rgyal po gzugs can snying po 'khor dang bcas pas ltas mkhan bram ze rnams bkug nas rmas pa/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis gnam kun
298a3(mdo sde): 'khrugs par 'gyur/ bram ze rnams kyis gsol pa/ lhas 'di lta bu dag mig bcu gnyis zhes bgyi ba'i gtsug lag las 'byung ste/ bdag gi khrel par rngo mi thog go// de nas rgyal po
298a4(mdo sde): gzugs can snying po bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can gyi don du thugs brtse bar dgongs te
298a5(mdo sde): mig bcu gnyis kyi ltas kyi gtsug lag bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa/ rab tu byung bas ni phyi rol pa 'jig rten gyi gtsug lag 'di lta bu dag bshad pa'i cha
298a6(mdo sde): ma yin no/ / de nas yang rgyal po gzugs can snying pos/ bcom ldan 'das la bsgyur te gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te/ the tshom 'dri dgrol
298a7(mdo sde): du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad par gnang nas/ sngon gyi gleng gzhi bka' stsal pa/ rgyal po chen po sngon 'das pa'i dus na/ gangs ri'i drung na drang srong brga zhes bya
298b1(mdo sde): ba zhig gnas pa de dus gzhan zhig na stag mo gzhon nu zhig 'khyam pa mthong ba dang / 'dod chags skyes te/ drang srong gi 'khrig pa'i chos spyad pa las/ lo dus su bu bcu gnyis byung
298b2(mdo sde): bar gyur to/ / bu btsas nas lo bdun lon pa dang / pha ma gnyis shi nas/ phrug gu rnams kyis lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du tshangs pa'i dngos grub bsgrubs nas/ bsam pa dang re ba
298b3(mdo sde): bskang bar gsol pa dang / de nas tshangs pas snying rje bltas te/ brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas par 'dzam bu'i gling du lhags te/ de nas tshangs
298b4(mdo sde): pas byis pa de rnams la smras pa/ bu khyed rnams ci 'dod/ de nas byis pa rnams kyis/ tshangs pa la smras pa/ lha bdag cag rnams ni byis pa rang bzhin shin tu blo dman pa
298b5(mdo sde): lags te/ legs nyes ma 'tshal lags na/ nyi zla dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar gyi ltas dang / dkyil 'khor dang / gtsug lag ji lta bu lags pa bshad du gsol/ de nas brgya
298b6(mdo sde): byin lha'i dbang pos/ tshangs pa la 'di skad ces smras so// lha'i ston pa khyod kyis byis pa rnams la dngos grub stsal ba'i rigs so// de nas tshangs pas/ byis pa rnams la smras pa
298b7(mdo sde): byis pa nyon cog/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / skar ma thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang / ltas dang / nyi zla dang / gza' dang / gnam lcags 'bab pa dang / sa g.yo zhing
299a1(mdo sde): 'gul ba dang / ltas kyi gtsug lag ji lta bu yin pa dag bstan par bya'o// dgun zla ra ba yar gyi ngo dang / mar gyi ngo dang / tshes brgyad dang / bcu bzhi dang
299a2(mdo sde): bco lnga la nyi ma'i 'od mun pa 'dra ba nag por gyur na/ mi ya rabs mdzangs shing mkhas pa rnams la bgegs chen po 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyu skar a shI ni'i nyi ma la/ nyi ma las du ba 'dra ba
299a3(mdo sde): byung ste/ 'khor zhing 'thul na/ lo bcu gnyis kyi bar du char mi 'bab par 'gyur ro// rgyu skar b+ha ra na'i nyi ma la/ nyi ma gser gyi mdog 'dra bar gyur na/ nyen kor gyi rgyal khams kyi yul
299a4(mdo sde): 'jig pa dang / dbus su mu ge chen po 'byung ngo // dgun zla tha chung gi ngo// rgyu skar karti ka'i nyi ma la/ nyi ma lhag par gsal bar gyur na/ mtha'i yul khams 'jig cing / dbus
299a5(mdo sde): su char mi 'ong ngo / / dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo// rgyu skar arta'i nyi ma la/ nyi ma 'khyims pa dang / nyi ma gnyis su snang na/ mi nad 'byung // rgyal po sde gnyis la gnod pa'i bgegs 'byung /
299a6(mdo sde): dgun zla 'bring po'i ngo// rgyu skar puSh+pe'i nyi ma la/ nyi ma mun pa 'dra bar 'gyur zhing / nyi ma nub kar kha dog skya bor gyur na/ rgyal po chen po la bgegs 'byung / dpyid zla tha chung gi ngo //
299a7(mdo sde): rgyu skar ba ra na'i dus la nyi zla gzas zin na/ blon pos rgyal po gsad par 'ong ngo // dbyar zla ra ba'i ngo/ rgyu skar bur ba b+ha da tra pa'i dus la nyi ma dmar por gyur na/ rgyal po dang /
299b1(mdo sde): blon po dang / de'i yul 'khor du gnod pa'i bgegs chen po 'byung / dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo/ rgyu skar a sha da'i dus la zla ba nya la gzas zin na/ yu 'khor 'khrug pa dang / mi nad dang
299b2(mdo sde): mu ge 'byung / dbyar zla tha chung gi ngo// rgyu skar mu la'i dus la/ nyi zla gas shing ser ga byung bar snang na/ yul der gnod pa chen po 'byung / ston zla ra ba'i ngo// rgyu skar a shi na'i dus la
299b3(mdo sde): nyi zla dus gcig tu shar na/ yul 'khor der khrag khrug chen pos khrag 'bab par 'ong ngo // ston zla 'bring po'i ngo/ rgyu skar karti ka'i dus zla ba nya la zla ba me'i kha dog 'dra bar gyur na/
299b4(mdo sde): yul 'khor der dgra'i dmag gis yul 'jig par 'gyur/ dgun zla ra ba'i ngo// rgyu skar ba ra na'i nyi ma la rlung dmar nag po byung la/ nyi ma mi gsal bar gyur na/ dgra'i tshogs kyis yul
299b5(mdo sde): 'jig par 'gyur ro/ / dgun zla tha chung gi ngo// rgyu skar dur ba la rgyu na'i nyi ma la sa bab cing rlung dmar chen po byung na/ rgyal po chen po la gnod pa 'byung / dpyid zla rab 'bring po'i ngo
299b6(mdo sde): rgyu skar su sha kha pa'i nyi ma la ser ba bab na/ yul 'khor der khrag gi gnod pa 'byung / dpyid zla tha chung gi ngo/ rgyu skar dze ta sha'i nyi ma la nam nangs kar skar ma nyi ma pas 'od bzang por
299b7(mdo sde): gsal ba byung na/ gza' thams cad la bgegs chen po 'byung / dbyar zla ra ba'i ngo // rgyu skar a sha da'i nyi ma la sa bab cing nyi ma mi gsal na/ rgyal po stong 'khrug cing 'thab par
300a1(mdo sde): 'gyur/ yang dbyar zla ra ba'i ngo// rgyu skar a sha da'i nyi ma la rlung chen po byung na/ chu dkon/ kha zas dang 'bru zan ma rung bar 'gyur/ dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo/ rgyuska
300a2(mdo sde): sha ba na'i nyi ma la rlung drag por langs shing / nam mkha' mun par gyur na/ nye 'khor gyi yul khams gzhan du 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo// rgyu skar pur b+ha b+ha tra1
300a3(mdo sde): ma la ser ba bab/ gnam lcags grum na/ yul 'khor der nad dang / mu ge 'byung / dbyar zla tha chung gi ngo/ rgyu skar bad tra'i nyi ma la byang phyogs nas rlung dmar chen po langs nas/ lha khang
300a4(mdo sde): dang mchod rten dang / khang khyim dang / shing sdong po chen po bsgyel na/ yul khams su gnod pa chen po 'byung / ston zla ra ba'i ngo/ rgyu skar ma sha na'i nyi ma la thog bab bam/ skar mda'
300a5(mdo sde): lhung ngam/ ser ba bab na yul khams der 'thab mo chen po 'ong / dgun zla ra ba'i ngo// rgyu skar ma ga'i nyi ma la char pa bab na/ yul khams thams cad kha zas mod par 'ong / dgun
300a6(mdo sde): zla tha chung gi ngo / rgyu skar a rda rnga'i nyi ma la gnam me'i kha dog 'dra bar gyur na/ ltas rab tu ngan te/ yul khams su mi bde ba dang / 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / dpyid zla tha chung gi ngo//
300a7(mdo sde): rgyu skar ba ra'i nyi ma la byang phyogs nas sgra chen po byung ngam/ gnam ser por song na/ dgra thams cad kyi yul khams bshig par 'gyur ro// dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo/ rgyu skar swa ri'i nyi ma
300b1(mdo sde): la char ba pa la/ rlung ma langs par 'ja' byung na/ grong khyer chen po mes tshig par 'gyur ro// dbyar zla ra ba'i ngo// rgyu skar pra sha'i nyi ma la glog dang / skar ma dang / nyal nyil gyi
300b2(mdo sde): char bab na/ yul khams der mu ge 'byung / dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo// rgyu skar mu la'i nyi ma la char cher bab la 'ja' byung na/ rgyal rigs rnams la gnod par 'gyur/ dbyar zla tha
300b3(mdo sde): chung gi ngo / / rgyu skar pad tra'i ba da'i nyi ma la sa las sgra byung ngam/ rlung nag po langs na/ yul der mu ge 'byung / dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo// phyogs mtshams dag nas sgra chen po byung
300b4(mdo sde): nayul phyogs der khrag khrug chen po 'byung / sten zla ra ba'i ngo// rgyu skar ba ra na'i nyi ma la gnam las sgra chen po byung na/ btsun pa dang dka' thub can rnams la gnod pa 'byung
300b5(mdo sde): ston zla ra ba'i ngo/ / dbang po nyi ma la ga nam las sgra byung na/ mi le lo can dang phyugs la gnod pa 'byung / ston zla tha chung gi ngo/ rgyu skar da ni sta'i nyi ma la gnam las rol mo'i sgra byung na
300b6(mdo sde): rtsa dang lo tog legs par 'gyur/ char dus su 'bab/ mjug tu mi nad 'byung / dgun zla ra ba'i ngo// rgyu skar swa ta'i nyi ma la gnam las sgra chen po 'byung zhing / gnam 'khrug
300b7(mdo sde): na yul 'khor der 'jigs pa chen po 'byung / dgun zla za chung gi / rgyu skar 'dzesh+tsa'i nyi ma la tshub ma langs shing sa g.yos na/ dge sbyong dang / bram ze rnams la bgegs dang
301a1(mdo sde): gnod pa 'byung / dpyid zla ra ba'i ngo/ rgyu skar bu rab b+had tra'i nyi ma la nyin par sa g.yos ma lo gnyis kyi bar du dus su yul khams der dmag 'ong / dpyid zla 'bring po'i ngo
301a2(mdo sde): rgyu skar pur ba sha ta'i nyi ma la sa 'gul na/ blon pos rgyal po bsad pa dang / yul khams der 'khrug pa chen po 'byung / dbyar zla 'bring po'i ngo// rgyu skar mu la dbang ba la nub mo sa
301a3(mdo sde): g.yos na/ khams kyi dbang po rnams la gnod pa 'byung / dbyar zla tha chung gi ngo/ rgyu skar ro hi ni dbang ba la nub mo sa g.yos shing / rlung dmar byung / char mi bab na/ 'bru zan ma
301a4(mdo sde): rung bar 'gyur zhing dmag 'ong / ston zla 'bring po'i ngo/ rgyu skar pa tra ba da'i nyi ma la nyin par sa g.yos na/ pha rol gyi dgras rgyal po de 'pham par 'gyur/ yul phyogs kyang chom
301a5(mdo sde): rkun gyis 'jig par 'gyur/ ston zla tha chung gi ngo/ rgyu skar tri ta'i nyi ma las g.yos na/ grong khyer chen po dang / khang khyim 'jig cing mu ge 'byung / dgun zla ra ba'i ngo/
